name: Sonic & Sega All-Stars Racing
description:
Explore stunning new circuits including Sonic Seaside Hill, Curien Mansion and Blizzard Castle as you zip around medieval castle ramparts, hurtle under lush rain forest canopies and tear through bustling city scapes in a frantic race to the finish line. Jostle against a selection of 20 challengers including Super Monkey Ball’s Ai Ai, Amigo from Samba and the evil Dr. Eggman in your unique character vehicle. Stay ahead of the pack by dodging traps and launching outrageous character moves such as the invincible Super Sonic, Banana Blitz assault of monkey balls or Tails wild Tornado - set to throw any vehicle clean in the air! But if you’ve been battered, beaten and broken, it’s not over yet! Super-charge your vehicle with power-ups to get back in the race and be sure to stay alert for the secret short-cuts that will give you the edge to victory.
Party Racing Fun - Battle it out in single player, challenge your friends in 4 player split-screen for the ultimate track racing showdown!
All Your Favorite Racers - Choose from 20 different characters from the Sonic & SEGA universe including Sonic, Tails, Aiai and Amigo.
High Velocity Vehicles - Every character drives their own unique vehicle including sports cars, bikes, planes and even a giant banana to perform bespoke special man-oeuvres!
All-Star Moves - Need to get by a competitor? Can’t overtake a racer? Then take them out with a pick-up weapon (missiles, mines and other obstacles) or one of the 20 unique character moves that allows the recipient to know who just hit them!
Stunning Visuals - Race over medieval castle ramparts, under lush rain forest canopies and through bustling city scapes as you battle through 27 challenging tracks from the Sonic and Sega Universe.

name: Spider-Man 3
description:
The Game Boy Advance version of Spider-Man 3, a videogame based on the 2007 movie of the same name.

The Game Boy Advance version is a level-based 2D side-scrolling beat 'em up; only the characters are rendered in 2.5D. A map is used to enter levels, and each level has question bubbles that give hints.

name: Korax' Heritage: Scattered Evil
description: Korax’ Heritage: Scattered Evil, the first game built upon the Vavoom-based KoraxRPG (KRPG) engine, is a cross-breed between a first person shooter and a role playing game, set in the world of Hexen. In addition to the 3D movement, exploration and fighting of the original Hexen, you can travel around the world in different ways and talk to non player characters (NPCs) to learn new spells, acquire new weapons, buy useful items and more. In addition, you get experience for killing monsters and finishing quests. After earning sufficient experience, you level up, gaining more power. Your deeds as well as any useful information you come upon in your travels are automatically recorded in your journal.

name: Doctor Hospital: Hypocondriac Simulator
description: In the hospital again? Doctors are starting to doubt you, so they won't stop asking to find out if you are really sick. Remember your answers!! If you are wrong you will never get well.

name: 3D Puzzle: Castle
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful house.

name: Flawless Abbey
description: Discover the enigmatic and delicate world of The Flawless Abbey. Journey through the lovingly hand-painted fairytale, navigate the Labyrinth Tower using the Musical Star-Key - and unveil the fragile secrets of the Abbey and its inhabitants.

name: Bail or Jail
description: A 3 minute tag-battle with extra twists! Play as a Monster who must lock everyone into jail before time runs out, or as a Human who must avoid capture and bail their teammates out of trouble. Invite your friends and family to play this speedy game of cat and mouse - or rather, Monsters and Humans!

name: Space Crafting
description: Your ship crashed on an uninhabited planet, you need to get resources and repair the ship.

name: Eger
description: "Eger" is a colorful and enjoyable side-scrolling 2D platform shooter. Insectoid aliens attacked our planet, and you ended up in a dense forest with no support.

name: We are definitely the baddies
description: A minimalist city builder where only profits matter. Build factories and extract everything before you are forced to leave the planet.

name: Cyphers Game VR
description: Break Bolshevik ciphers and destroy a Soviet armored train - take part in a great history. VR version of crossplatform educational project prepared as a short point and click game.

name: Cardmon
description: Cardmon is a new adventure inspired in old monster-catching games. Jump in and explore the Tojo region while trying to catch all the Cardmon. Defeat every carder and become the Regional Cardmaster in this aestethic world!

name: Suicide Guy: Deluxe Plus
description: Suicide Guy: Deluxe Plus is the surreal puzzle game set in the dreams of its protagonist. Will you be able to save the thing you love most and overcome the neverending whirlwind of nightmares? Now in a new shiny edition.

name: Complex Doom: Clusterfuck
description: The Complex Clusterfuck is a conglomeration of a large amount of Complex Doom mods/addons, made by DustedPandemonic, and with contributions from many others.

name: Spider-Man 2
description:
The Game Boy Advance version of "Spider-Man 2".

In Spider-Man 2, Manhattan becomes a gamer's playground as you take the role of Spider-Man in a battle against the nefarious Doc Ock. Based on the plot of the movie Spider-Man 2 and the heroes and villains created by Marvel, the game allows players to encounter unique and dangerous villains as they patrol the streets and rooftops of the biggest city created in any Super Hero game to date.

As Spider-Man, players must master new combo moves as they protect the denizens of New York City from the nefarious Doc Ock and other classic Marvel villains by swinging, jumping and wall-crawling through 19 new levels that extend beyond the film. With an unprecedented depth of gameplay, players experience original storylines featuring Vulture, Shocker, Rhino, and Mysterio all while battling through graphically rich 3D environments.

name: Ultimate Card Games
description: Ultimate Card Games is a Board game, developed and published by Telegames, Inc., which was released in 2011.

name: Zootopia!
description: Sin descripción

name: Z-Opolis
description: Sin descripción

name: Zombiez Seeker
description: Sin descripción

name: Ancient Arenas: Chariots
description: Dangerous, grueling, fierce. Chariot Racing was by far the most favored sport of ancient times. Ancient Arenas takes you back to an age where charioteers were the richest sports stars and team owners were their ruthless and fearless managers.

name: Field of Glory: Kingdoms
description: Politics, religion, war. They are nothing without a legacy that can stand the test of time. Lead any nation, and turn it into a mighty kingdom in one of the most compelling grand strategy games ever created.

name: Terraforming Mars Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic's Bonus Game
description: Web browser game based on the special stages of Sonic 3D Blast used for contests on the Sega website.

name: Death Mark: Limited Edition
description: A strange rumor is spreading in Tokyo’s H City: those who possess the “mark” will die. Unexpectedly appearing on the body, like a chewed up birthmark, the “mark” is said to result in an unknown death. Now, having lost your memory, you stand before a mysterious house said to protect those who possess the “mark” As the doors swing open, the countdown to death has already begun.

name: Kyou Kara Maou!: Hajimari no Tabi
description: Kyo Kara Maoh! Hajimari no Tabi is an Action game, developed by Namco and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2006.

name: CyberAge
description:
CyberAge is a completely open world of the future, where you have to solve the mysteries of the unique, sometimes criminal, and controversial Iceberg City with the main character Max. The world of the far future, where humanity has more than once experienced global cataclysms. A society that has tamed advanced nano technologies and the planet's climate.

In the center of the conflict will be the ruling elite of Iceberg City and the usual mercenary Max, who will have to learn the human essence and stop the insidious plans of the greedy mafia. Use all tamed technologies, vehicles, weapons, absolutely everything to save humanity from extinction.

The future of our world is in your hands.

name: Superman Returns: The Videogame
description:
Superman Returns is a video game based on the movie of the same name, It was developed by EA Tiburon and published by Electronic Arts in conjunction with Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment and DC Comics. It features a story arc from the movie, which was released on June 28, 2006, and more than 60 years of comic book content. EA Tiburon, known for its Madden NFL game series, has claimed that the game combines strong creative vision and compelling new technology to deliver a powerful and emotional gaming experience to their consumers, and they will experience a real sense of flying while mastering Superman's superhero powers to save Metropolis.

In the game, Superman combats Bizarro, who does not appear in the movie, as well as other classic villains (including Mongul) as well as being able to play as Bizarro for a short period of time in one of the many minigames inserted into the game. The game was produced for the Xbox 360 as well as the Playstation 2 and Nintendo DS. A port for the PlayStation Portable was planned but cancelled due to it not having enough power to support the game.

Electronic Arts and Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment secured an all-star cast for the voices in Superman Returns: The Videogame. The game features the voice and likeness of Brandon Routh(Superman/Clark Kent) as well as the voices of Kevin Spacey (Lex Luthor), Kate Bosworth (Lois Lane), Parker Posey (Kitty Kowalski) and Sam Huntington (Jimmy Olsen), all reprising their roles from the Warner Bros. Pictures film directed by Bryan Singer.

name: Disney's Chicken Little: Ace in Action
description: Inspired by the "superhero movie within the movie" finale of Walt Disney Pictures' film "Chicken Little," Disney"s Chicken Little: Ace in Action features Ace, the superhero alter ego of Chicken Little, and the Hollywood versions of his misfit band of friends: Runt, Abby and Fish-Out-of-Water.

name: Ikaruga
description:
In this vertical scrolling spaceship shooter, you control a ship that can change its polarity at will. As blue/white, the ship can easily destroy red/black enemies, and visa versa. Bullets of your polarity can be collected to fuel your missile gauge, but those opposite will kill you. Destroying an enemy ship will make them drop points for you to pick up, but they are polarized, too. Different difficulties exist to change exactly how you interact with polarized points, or how they appear.

Ikaruga is a balls-hard shmup with lots of difficulty even at the easiest level, and lots of replay value for those willing to face the challenge.

name: Delta Force: Black Hawk Down
description: In late 1993, the United States launched dual military operations in Mogadishu Somalia. Delta Force Operatives and Army Rangers were sent in to capture Somali warlords and restore order. Experience the intense combat of Operation Restore Hope in this ground breaking first person shooter. As a Delta Force operative participate in a number of daring and intense raids against the oppressive Somali warlords in and around Mogadishu.

name: Iron Man 2
description: Iron Man 2 is a 2010 action-adventure video game loosely based on the film of the same name. The game has an original story written by The Invincible Iron Man scribe Matt Fraction. This story is set after the plot of the film, although the iOS and BlackBerry versions stick roughly to the film's plot. The game features the voices of Don Cheadle and Samuel L. Jackson, reprising their roles from the film.

name: James Cameron's Avatar: The Game
description: James Cameron's Avatar: The Game is the official video game based on the highly anticipated film James Cameron's Avatar.

name: Pokémon Quarantine Crystal
description: A mod of Pokémon Crystal featuring a completely new Pokédex designed by drearyterminarch. There are new trainers to face, an amped-up level curve, features from newer games like the Fairy-type and physical-special split, and a number of QoL features to make the Johto region feel fresh and interesting to explore.

name: HoverRider
description: This is a racing game in which the player drives through a world that combines cityscapes designed for the year 2090 with modern natural landscapes. The hovercraft controls are different from those of conventional games. You can experience a world that you have never experienced before.

name: Mortificare
description: Try to survive as long as you can in this fast paced game. Lets see how long you can keep on playing!

name: Beatus Creation Solitaire
description: Play with VTuber super crew “Beatus Creation” in the classic card game “Spider Solitaire”! Unlock new themes, illustrations, and stamps designed based on each member of Beatus Creation using the coins you earn each time you clear a stage.

name: LandPort
description: Today, the intelligent revolution is taking place. Release in the field of art and design and industry has become the focus of research in art and technology majors. The theme of the project is "Creating the future" is a response to the times when the intelligent revolution is taking place.

name: Kongeer
description: Tribute to the arcade games of the early eighties (Popeye, Donkey Kong..). 1 or 2 players. Great difficulty and addiction as in the games of the past, but with a control more in line with current times. Help Sir Redhood and Sir Greenstone rescue the princess from the clutches of Kongeer.

name: I wanna Reach the Top
description: In order the reach the top, you have to fall, a lot.

name: Space Turbo
description: Space Turbo - A dynamic 3D arcade game in which you have to fly a futuristic space plane through an endless tunnel and avoid various traps.

name: Red Solstice 2: Survivors - Insurgents
description: Experience a new story line with new characters and settings. Play as the Governor and take the fight to Elysium at every turn. Build up a resistance force and overthrow them.

name: Freshman Magic: Spellbooks and Tangled Sheets
description: Magic jock? Magic nerd? Magic bad boy? How about a magic librarian? Woo all of them while tackling the disappearances plaguing the campus.

name: Maps: U.S.A.
description: An educational game to make learning the name, location, and capitol of the fifty states of the Unites States of America fun.

name: The Lucid Dreamer Bundle
description:
Sherlock Holmes Chapter One + The Sinking City Bundle

Use your mind to investigate and your willpower to resist madness.

name: Sherlock Holmes Essential Bundle
description: Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One + Sherlock Holmes: Crimes and Punishments + Sherlock Holmes: The Devil's Daughter Bundle

name: H.I.V.E.
description: H.I.V.E. is a roguelite autochess game where the player leads the Clone revolution. It's the year 2424 a technology corporation has created the H.I.V.E. clones to take care of sanitation tasks. But now this beings have gained awareness and are taking over the city. Lead the clones to victory.

name: Punk Wars: Threat From Within
description: Threat from Within DLC brings two new game modes to the world of Punk Wars!Take control over a small squad of units and try to survive as long as you can in a competitive survival mode. Or embark on a journey of betrayal and retribution in a brand new, story-oriented Atompunk solo campaign!

name: Teleball
description: Teleball is a VR game that lets you do everyone's favorite thing in VR, throw stuff! Use 8 powerful Teleballs to teleport around environments with more than 60 obstacles, traps, and more! Teleball is designed with accessibility in mind, everyone's invited to come check out our balls!

name: Surflexers
description: Surflexers is a fast-paced VR game with puzzle elements where you have to make quick decisions and move along "lines" to advance in the game

name: Sol Cresta: Dramatic DLC
description: Stand up, Sol Cresta, and take back the sun from the clutches of evil! The galaxy-sized Sol Cresta Dramatic Mode has docked!

name: Mini Royale
description: In Mini Royale, up to 50 toy soldiers fight for victory. The game is played in a children's bedroom, from a rather unusual perspective, full of exciting things to discover, and lots of weapons and equipment that will help you set yourself apart from other players.

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Scenes with Horses
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: Landscapes with Flags of the World - Asia vol.1
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Jigsaw Masterpieces: World's Most Scenic Train Trips
description: This is the additional puzzle pack for "Jigsaw Masterpieces".

name: Aliens: Fireteam Elite - Into the Hive Edition
description: Set in the iconic Alien universe, Aliens: Fireteam Elite is a cooperative third-person survival shooter that drops your fireteam of hardened marines into a desperate fight to contain the evolving Xenomorph threat.2202. A mysterious distress call reroutes your Marine Assault Unit to LV-895 in the outer colonies, where deadly Xenomorph legions, hidden corporate secrets, and ancient alien ruins await your arrival.

name: Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin - Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Stranger of Paradise: Final Fantasy Origin
- Artbook
- Script book
- T-shirt
- Vinyl LP

name: Winning Post 9: 2022
description: A new system called Yushun no Kizuna, represents a bond between horses.

name: Just Cause 4: Day One Edition
description: Rogue agent Rico Rodriguez journeys to Solis, a huge South American world home of conflict, oppression and extreme weather conditions. Strap into your wingsuit, equip your fully customizable grappling hook, and get ready to bring the thunder!

name: Klonoa Phantasy Reverie Series: Special Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Klonoa Phantasy Reverie Series
- Artbook
- Digital Soundtrack
- Costume DLC

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets the Movie: Five Memories of My Time With You - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- The Quintessential Quintuplets the Movie: Five Memories of My Time with You
- Five-disc drama CD set

name: Street Fighter V: Champion Edition - All Character Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Flora and Sauna
description: Flora and Sauna is an 18+ visual novel set at a spa with some unique services. Explore the spa and meet a fun cast of interesting characters! Help them out, and they'll be sure to reward you in their own special ways~

name: Songs of Conquest: Supporter Edition
description: Get all the packages in one sweep! Base game, Supporter Pack and the Soundtrack! Check out each individual item for more information about what they contain.

name: Gotham Knights: Deluxe Edition
description:
The Gotham Knights Deluxe Edition includes the main game and the Visionary Pack.

The Visionary Pack includes:
- Exclusive "Knightwatch by Jim Lee" Transmog
- Beyond Suitstyle, inspired by Batman Beyond universe
- Salvage to build new Gear
- Boosted Gear
- Exclusive Emote
- Three exclusive Suit Colorways
- Ultra Zur-En-Arrh
- Chroma Frost
- Tribute Asylum

name: Redout: Ultimate Edition
description: Race faster than ever! Redout will test your skills to the limit as you dart at incredible speed across all manner of futuristic environments, both in offline and online play. Includes all of the game’s DLCs, as well as the official artbook and soundtrack.

name: Risk of Rain 2 + Survivors of the Void
description: Unleash the critically acclaimed Risk of Rain 2 and its first ever expansion Survivors of the Void! Escape a chaotic alien planet by fighting through hordes of frenzied monsters – with your friends, or on your own.

name: Mortal Shell: Game of the Year Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Mortal Shell [Game of the Year Edition]
- Steelbook
- The Virtuous Cycle DLC
- A3 Poster
- Holograph Postcards
- Limited Edition letter ( all numbered)

name: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - The Hinokami Chronicles: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Hinokami Keppuutan
- Original figure multi-stand
- Digital content DLC

name: Call of Duty: Advanced Warfare - Dubbed Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: The Quintessential Quintuplets: Five Memories Spent With You
description: I want to confess my feelings for you...

name: Anonymous;Code: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Anonymous;Code
- Guidebook
- Soundtrack CD

name: Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Monochrome Mobius: Rights and Wrongs Forgotten
- Exclusive Box
- Artbook
- Original Soundtrack

name: Riders Republic: Freeride Edition
description: A pack that includes the base game plus the Neon Pack.

name: Dragon's Dogma Online: Season 2 - Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Original DLC
- Artbook: The Art of Dragon’s Dogma Online Season 2

name: Mell Kiss: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Mell Kiss
- B2 Tapestry
- Kiss Series Uniform Collection: Kiss Collection,
- Mell Kiss Original Soundtrack: Kiss Shot
- Mini Message Card

name: Refrain no Chika Meikyuu to Majo no Ryodan: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Refrain no Chika Meikyuu to Majo no Ryodan
- Tarot Card (22p)
- Otiginal Soundtrack CD

name: Until the End
description: In Until The End, you play as Zoe, a young nurse who has just graduated. At the Montagne Institute, you will help her make the best decisions for the well-being of her patients in a palliative care unit.

name: Donut 80
description:
What if Donut Games were made in the 80s?
Donut 80 is a collection of games and demakes of classic Donut Games featuring low resolution graphics, 16-color palettes and chip music.

name: King's Path Solitaire
description:
Find your path!
In King’s Path Solitaire, all the cards are on the table. Your task is to find descending paths starting with each King. Solve the puzzle by finding paths that cover every card. This fresh take on the solitaire genre allows for quick play sessions, but plenty of strategy.

name: Metal Max Xeno: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Metal Max Xeno x 1
- Exclusive Metal Max 25th Anniversary Soundtrack CD x 3
- Special Book: The History of Destruction and Creation (128-page) x 1
- Special DLC

name: Disgaea 1 Complete: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following:
- Disgaea 1 Complete
- Original soundtrack selection
- Daily tear-off desktop calendar
- Special Box

name: Pure Hold 'Em World Poker Championships
description: Play Your Cards Right!Pure Hold’em World Poker Championshipcombines stunning visuals

name: Castlevania: Spectral Interlude
description: Castlevania: Spectral Interlude is an action-adventure platform game with elements of RPG. It merges well known elements of classic games with some new ideas. It tells a new story which tries to remain consistent with the canon of original franchise and explains why Belmonts disappeared for many years.

name: The Somerton Man
description:
On 1 December 1948, a body was found on Somerton Beach in Adelaide, Australia. From there unfolded one of the most perplexing (and still unsolved) mysteries of the 20th century.
This game seeks to recreate the experience of the 1948-1949 investigation.

name: Edge of Infinity
description: Edge of Infinity is a multiplayer space warfare game. Enter your starship and challenge your friends to all-out battles across the stars. Each match will be unique; containing different ships, weapons, armies, and strategy - all decided by the player.

name: Victim
description: Play as the Vulnerable Victim Face the Odds against the never ending threat of the Ominous Oppression. Explore the Mysterious Existential Crisis of the Desolate World as everything threatens The Victim's sensibilities.

name: Dub Club
description: A third person multiplayer virtual music venue featuring an in-game live music stream.

name: The Rhythm of the Knight
description: ROTK is a VR rhythm game based on your reflex and lightsaber skill. Deflect shots, slash projectiles, slash enemies, dodge obstacles, use your powers to break others. All this to the beat of a dark techno song in hand-crafted levels designed to match the music.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Coteries of New York & Shadows of New York: Collector's Edition
description:
This edition includes the following;

+ Vampire - The Mascarade: Coteries of New York (the game)
+ Vampire - The Mascarade: Shadows of New York (the game)
+ The art book
+ The original sound track in vinyl format

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku Wo! Noroi no Ibutsu to Madoishi Bokensha-tachi: Limited Edition
description:
This edition includes the following;
- PS4 Game
- Acrylic Figure
- B2 Tapestry
- Soundtrack CD
- Costume DLC (While supplies last)

name: Witch on the Holy Night
description: Set in 1980s Japan, Witch on the Holy Night tells the story of fan-favorite Type-Moon character Aoko Aozaki as she attempts to navigate the complex world of magecraft while also dealing with the everyday struggles of life as a high school student! Players will experience the thrilling origin story of this much-beloved character, penned by Kinoko Nasu, famed creator of the Fate series, himself.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel I - IV & Trails into Reverie Complete Box
description: At Thors Military Academy, Erebonia’s best and brightest learn everything from the art of war to the liberal arts. First-year Rean Schwarzer learns that he's been selected as a member of Class VII, which controversially includes both nobles and commoners. But they’ll need to deal with more than just class warfare - they’ll need to safeguard their country from those who would plunge it into chaos.

name: Baw's Pharmacy
description: Baw’s Pharmacy is a mobile time management and strategy game. Players manage a medical warehouse and sell products to hospitals and clinics. Customers will approach the sales counter and request a specific item for purchase.

name: Watercolor Hell
description: A rouge-lite wave survival bullet hell focused on customizing weapons. Evolve weapon specializations from base weapons each run. Level up to compliment your next build with more projectiles, speed, and starting weapons. Complete chapters to get permanent stacking damage and new weapons.

name: Automation Station
description: Explore a mysterious planet, harvest and refine resources, discover new technology, craft machines, and set up automated factories.

name: Screaming Skies
description: Sin descripción

name: Sonic Robo Blast!
description: "It’s a Robo Blast from the past!" It’s time for a brand new version of Sonic Robo Blast! The classic fan game last updated back in 1998, modernized with love and care on the Core Plus Framework! Take control of Sonic, Tails, Knuckles and a special guest, as you venture through the evil scientist Doctor Eggman’s brand new base of operation: Robotropic! And put a stop to his plan to snatch all the rings on the planet!

name: Witches' Legacy: Lair of the Witch Queen & Witches' Legacy: Hunter and the Hunted
description: Sin descripción

name: WingNuts
description: Sin descripción

name: Wine Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Wild Wild West: The Steel Assassin
description: Sin descripción

name: Monstopia: Chronicle of Jade's
description: Stop bad cat warriors so that Jade can run a store in the strategy defense game "Monstopia".

name: Namae no Nai Yoru
description: This is a world where witches and demons dwell in the far reaches of reality. Charles is in the rain looking for shelter, when he meets a woman who asks him for a favor, to look for something very precious to her. At that moment, Charles finds a house and enters it, meeting a mysterious girl.

name: Find
description:
Misha's brother, Howard, told her a bedtime story... but when she woke up, the girl found herself in a different home, and Howard had disappeared.

"This must be a dream...Brother, where are you?"

Despite investigating the surroundings within that dream, Howard doesn't seem to be anywhere. And there is also a monster that stalks furiously.

The monster attacked Misha and suddenly a doll named Luig came to her aid. Luig will help Misha escape from this nightmare and find her lost brother.

name: HideNSeek
description: The HideNSeek Beta was a game demo by Innersloth, mainly worked on by Forest Willard, with features that were planned to be in Among Us 2. It requires ten people to start a game. Players must be in the Innersloth Discord server and link their account to play, and high scores would be recorded in a channel.[

name: Vampir Kyuuketsuki Densetsu
description: Vampir Kyuuketsuki Densetsu is an RPG focusing on a vampire named Christopher in the 19th century. It features a day-night cycle with multiple animal forms for Christopher to morph between along with a host of NPCs in each featured town.

name: Arsilon
description: Arsilon - the adventure of astronaut Alice on another planet. After a crash landing, she needs to find and collect the lost spaceship components. On spacious maps, mortal dangers will lie in wait for her. To get to special places, you have to find a non-obvious path.

name: Ghostlight Melancholia
description: Ghostlight Melancholia is a retro horror first person mystery solving game, where you find out what connects the four ghostlights, the evil that is after them and the secrets behind it all.

name: Blade Bros Action!
description: Blade Bros Action!, presents you with a new game genre "Hack n' Platformer", is a fast-paced gameplay that is a mix of hack n' slash and platforms games, joins the retro pixel graphics, a cool soundtrack, stylish bosses, dynamic battles, swords, skills, magic elements and so forth.

name: Shump Mania
description: Challenge yourself to complete this classic retro-style adventure

name: Pixel Game Maker Series LAB
description: What happened in the facility where people disappeared? Mystery horror adventure game!

name: Construction Machines SIM: Bridges, buildings and constructor trucks simulator
description: Have you ever imagined driving a concrete pump, bulldozer or even a tower crane? Discover the new construction game.

name: Dreams of Pain
description: Dreams of Pain is a highly experimental first-person mystery horror game with elements of horror in its atmosphere. The structure of the game is mostly linear. The game incorporates ARG-like elements into its storytelling. The game's art style was inspired by retro games from the late '90s. It doesn't hold your hand and there are no traditional tutorials for the player. Some of the puzzles in the game are types of puzzles not seen in any game before.

name: Flam the Purge of the Century
description: Sin descripción

name: Space Shuttle
description: Sin descripción

name: Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare
description: The Game Boy Color version of Alone in the Dark: The New Nightmare received a relatively faithful version of the home console game. The cartridge-based format necessitated the loss of the full motion video cut scenes from the other versions and many game play areas had to be reduced in size while some were eliminated entirely. However the basic pre-rendered environments and 3D character imposed on top of them remain.

name: Army Men: Sarge's Heroes 2
description: Sarge's Heroes 2 starts where Sarge's Heroes left off. It is announced that the capture of Field Marshal Tannenberg will end the war. Since General Plastro has disappeared, it is suggested that he has become a victim of plastrification and been trapped in the real world. The game introduces Bridgette Bleu, a spy for the Blue Nation. She has developed a serum that reverses plastrification. Your job as Sarge and sometimes Vikki is to destroy the serum, eliminate Tan soldiers, and capture Plastro and Tannenburg.

name: Army Men: World War
description: 16 missions await you and your green army as you wage war against the tan army through true world war environments including beaches, jungles, countrysides and war-torn cities. Each army man has a range of weapons to use, including pistols, flame throwers and the bazooka. You can also use heavy artillery such as tanks, jeeps and boats when normal attacks fail to breach the enemy line.

name: Space Dog Run
description: A hungry dog has stolen sausages from a butcher, got him infuriated and is followed by him now. Help the doggy gain speed not to be caught while catching more sausages and coins on his way, going round obstacles and keeping the tempo in the funny arcade game Space Dog Run.

name: Badanamu First Step
description: Learn essential pre-k skills by playing with all the Badanamu and friends.

name: Defender of the Favicon
description: The menace come from above! Protect the humanoid population from the waves of aliens coming to abduct them. Thankfully the shield of your Defender can take a few hit.

name: Smilemo
description: A new side-scrolling platformer where you go flying out of control at the slightest touch! In this virus-infected world, it is your job to collect the scattered pieces of vaccine code and exterminate the virus!

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Additional Characters
description: Includes 4 new additional characters with unique perks !

name: Roots of Tomorrow: Beekeeping
description: Install beehives on all your farms! Produce and sell honey and explore the challenges of beekeeping !

name: Paranoid: Half-Life for Doom
description: Paranoid, a production of The Persecution Complex, is now available for download. For those of you who can't be bothered with reading the rest of this carefully constructed page here is a download link to the game. Go forth and waste ye no more time.

name: Paranoid: Paranoiac
description: Paranoiac, the sequel to Paranoid.

name: Big Mutha Truckers 2
description: The truckers return and this time you have to get Ma Jackson off the hook after being arrested for tax evasion. Bribe the jurors as you take the roll of Ma's cousin Jacob in a race to make money by trucking and trading. Drive and go almost everywhere at any time in a bigger environment than the original finding shortcuts and new towns to go trucking in. Trading is only a small part of the game and has been simplified to allow more time driving.

name: Not Your Mind
description: An experimental first person adventure/horror/exploration game that takes place in a dream-like world.

name: BlackWhite
description: Use black or white side to complete 48 levels.

name: Doom 64 for Doom II
description: Doom 64 for Doom II is a vanilla recreation/re-imagining of the Doom 64 maps. They are made with [mostly] vanilla assets and can run in the original vanilla Doom (and Chocolate Doom). The goal was to recreate the major aspects of the maps while allowing for creative liberties where needed or wanted. There are lots of new graphics, some new textures (like skies), some new music tracks, a couple of new monsters, and minor enhancements for folks who play in advanced ports (like GZDoom).

name: Doom 64: Retribution
description: This project is a fan recreation of Doom 64 for the Nintendo 64 to the GZDoom engine. The goal of the project is be mostly accurate to the original game as well as add very minor improvements for that extra bit of polish. Think of this mod as being an enhanced version of Doom 64 for GZDoom. We have Doom 64 EX, Doom 64 Absolution TC, GZDoom64, and Brutal Doom 64. Why you ask? I was personally dissatisfied with the quality of the GZDoom64 project, and Brutal Doom 64 (while it is a great improvement) is along the same lines but changes too much and deviates from the original Doom 64 experience. And thus, this project was born.

name: A Tiny Flicker
description: Do not stay away from the light for too long though... something lurks in the shadows...

name: Dampftraum
description: Made by Jitsu

name: Lose 95
description: Sin descripción

name: Keymasher Ultimate
description: DESTROY YOUR KEYBOARD KUEHZUHFUIEZHUIFEDIZ

name: Somnokid
description: Stave off your nightmares in this unique shmup/platformer hybrid!

name: The Final Boss
description: Ever wonder what the boss does without you?

name: Aspen
description: Explore a mysterious shattered world rife with danger

name: Bumpers & Broadswords
description: Pog Slammers X Fire Emblem?

name: Bowling Cross: Final Frame
description: BOWLING CROSS: DARK LEGACY OF THE DEVIL BOWLER (FINAL FRAME) is the complete version of BOWLING CROSS, a weird GBC-style Battle-Bowling Action RPG - play as a roaming adventurer, using Custom Battle-Bowling Balls to knock down your enemies!

name: Rolling in the Sheepe
description: 1-6 sheep compete to roll over the finish line first. Rollable shape not required.

name: Cogs of Combat
description: 2D Cover-based Carnage

name: Round Ogre
description: A puzzler about an Ogre who is just too excited about life. A sort-of sequel to Square Ogre.

name: Descent
description: Explore the abandoned vessel VALIS XI and piece together the secrets of the crew's disappearance.

name: Conflict / Resolution
description: A quirky RPG made in 72 hours about bringing a space station of aliens together to stop an evil virus...

name: Intergalactic Taxi Co.
description: Intergalactic Taxi Co. is a casual puzzle game about picking up and dropping off passengers across a colorful, low-poly galaxy. Plan your route carefully to avoid running out of fuel and get everyone where they need to be!

name: Simulacrum
description: Swing through abstract dreams and blow through hordes of enemies at breakneck speed. A first person aerial movement shooter.

name: Yosemite Forest Ranger
description: In Yosemite Forest Ranger you will fill the shoes of Theodore Thompson. You will find out why he left the big city life to be a Forest Ranger through Story Rich Gameplay and Voice Acting. With a Survival aspect as well. A very Rich Open World with loads of Forageables and Wildlife to Explore.

name: Core of Innocence
description: Core of Innocence is a platform adventure game in a similar vein to Castlevania.

name: changeType()
description: Swap all spikes with blocks or springs with coins. Rewire the Platformer!

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - The Bad Batch Character Pack
description: Be a clone unlike any other. The elite Clone Force 99, also known as The Bad Batch, each have their own exceptional skills making them a formidable crew. The character pack includes: - Hunter - Echo - Wrecker - Tech - Crosshair

name: Shmup Mania
description: Challenge yourself to complete this classic retro-style adventure.

name: Project Crypt
description: Project Crypt: The horror adventure about escaping a city overrun by monsters.

name: Scavenger's Deep
description: Scavenger's Deep is an underwater 3rd person action roguelike game, with an emphasis on player movement for traversing the game world and encounters.

name: Molecule Make Lab
description: Molecule Maker Lab is a puzzle game about chemicals with futuristic and minimalist themes. Rotate and arrange the atoms in the correct position until you form a beautiful molecule.

name: Super Karoshi
description:
Why are we always avoiding the spikes and trying to reach "the exit"? Boring, I say.
In Karoshi, the goal is to die.
This time you'll be able to turn into Super Karoshi and help others (kill themselves).
Around 60 stages. Have fun!

name: Pop Pop Pop!
description: Sin descripción

name: Quick Quack
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - The Mandalorian: Season 1 - Character Pack
description: This is the Way. Play as the iconic characters from the hit series The Mandalorian Season 1. Travel around the galaxy as The Mandalorian protecting Grogu at all costs. The character pack includes: - The Mandalorian - Cara Dune - Greef Karga - IG-11 - Kuiil

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Solo: A Star Wars Story - Character Pack
description: Experience the galaxy with the characters from the prequel "Solo: A Star Wars Story." Play as the young scoundrels and blast your way through the epic saga. The character pack includes: - Han Solo (Young) - Chewbacca (Young) - Lando (Young) - Qi'ra - Tobias Beckett - Enfys Nest

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - The Mandalorian: Season 2 - Character Pack
description: Get into more action with the fan-favorite characters from Season 2 of the hit series "The Mandalorian." Play as Ahsoka Tano, Anakin Skywalker's former padawan with her dual lightsabers, and Boba Fett with his recovered armor.

name: LEGO Star Wars: The Skywalker Saga - Trooper Pack
description: Play as the soldiers of the Empire from Rogue One: A Star Wars Story, Solo: A Star Wars Story, and The Mandalorian. - Imperial Death Trooper - Incinerator Stormtrooper - Range Trooper - Imperial Shoretrooper - Mimban Stormtrooper

name: Construction Machines Sim
description: Now it's your time to learn to operate heavy construction machines thanks to Construction Machines SIM: Bridges, buildings and constructor trucks simulator!

name: Salad Bar Tycoon: Extended Edition
description: Look out, this awesome salad bar will soon become the best one in town! Become the manager of a salad bar and learn for yourself just how hard it can be. Be careful not to mix up your recipes!

name: Redemption Cemetery: The Stolen Time - Collector's Edition
description: After a terrible accident, you wake to find yourself in another realm! A dangerous entity threatens to destroy the constructs of time itself, taking humanity into darkness along with it! Do you have what it takes to save the world before it’s too late?

name: Metal World: Street Scraps
description: Metal World is an endless racing game set in a retrofuturistic world, exploring different eras and themes, assemble your vehicle with scrap parts to travel long paths, test your reflexes and drive at high speed!

name: Escape the Ayuwoki Demake
description: Re-experience the classic Escape the Ayuwoki adventure through this Demake, solving more complex puzzles and exploring new places with the old camera angles of 90’s horror games.

name: Umichan Sorani
description: Take the role of Zytra, a busty girl trying to get money for her sister. Will you help her get it the easy way? Or the sleazy way?

name: Late Photographer 5
description: A simple and easy beauty dynamic jigsaw puzzle and relaxing music can make you have a good mood The right mouse button can quickly complete the puzzle.

name: Total War: Three Kingdoms - The Furious Wild
description: With the introduction of The Furious Wild Expansion Pack comes the first ever extension of the Total War: Three Kingdom’s map and its already rich cast of characters. Visit the jungles around Southern China and with it, the fearsome tribes of the Nanman. Will you unite the tribes of the south?

name: Lose/Lose
description: Lose/Lose is a shoot-'em-up and art video game developed by Zach Gage and released in 2009 for Windows and MacOS as part of his master's thesis show, "Data", at Parsons School of Design's MFA program. Styled after games like Galaga, the player controls a spaceship and can shoot at aliens in their path, each representing a random file on the player's computer. Destroying an alien causes the file to be deleted, potentially corrupting the player's operating system, while dying causes the game itself to be deleted. The aliens do not attack and only act as dangerous obstacles.

name: Yume Mitai
description: Yume Mitai is a traditional Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The objective is to explore Tsukino's dream world and obtain effects to unlock the ending.

name: Agony
description: Agony is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame, where the objective is to collect effects in Aoi's and Yuuka's dream world. Aoi and Yuuka have different types of Media. Aoi has two different Media: usable effects and collectibles. Yuuka, on the other hand, only has usable effects. Additionally, both have Memories that are required to unlock endings.

name: I Cannot Drown
description: Created for Dream Diary Jam 3 and updated for later jams, I Cannot Drown is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame with 11 available effects as of Version 1.01

name: Minemadness
description: A game that innovates the way you can find (sometimes not) mines in a field, through clues given by numbers and your own logical reasoning, train, win and share your scores with your friends and the whole world, Minemadness offers 4 game modes: Classic, Madness, Training and Custom.

name: Star Wars Jedi: Survivor
description: The story of Cal Kestis continues in Star Wars Jedi: Survivor, a third-person, galaxy-spanning, action-adventure game from Respawn Entertainment, developed in collaboration with Lucasfilm Games. This narratively driven, single-player title picks up five years after the events of Star Wars Jedi: Fallen Order and follows Cal’s increasingly desperate fight as the galaxy descends further into darkness. Pushed to the edges of the galaxy by the Empire, Cal will find himself surrounded by threats new and familiar. As one of the last surviving Jedi Knights, Cal is driven to make a stand during the galaxy’s darkest times — but how far is he willing to go to protect himself, his crew, and the legacy of the Jedi Order?

name: Warframe: Dark Sectors
description: Tenno, we have received word that Vay Hek has enlisted the ranks of the Grineer Prosecutors and Guardsmen to keep the Tenno at bay. To fight Vay Hek players must first find his location, a secret the Prosecutors protect.

name: Warframe: The Mad Cephalon
description:
New User Experience 2.0!
Quest System
Player Ship
Diegetic UI
Genetic Foundry & The Kubrow
New Warframe: Mirage!
A Region Infested: Eris!
New Weapons!
Dark Sectors Enhanced!
Dynamic Music Additions:
3 new Alt Helmets!

name: Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix 2
description: Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix 2 is a cancelled sequel of Dance Dance Revolution Mario Mix that was planned for the Nintendo Wii. It's existence was confirmed when documents relating to the Wii hardware were leaked as a part of the July 2021 batch of the gigaleaks. It's currently unknown if development ever officially started.

name: Big Brother
description: Big Brother is a cancelled PC game based on George Orwell's novel 1984.

name: Hammer vs. Evil D. in Soulfire
description: Hammer vs. Evil D. in Soulfire is an unreleased Sega Mega-CD action game based around the American rapper MC Hammer.

name: Math Bingo
description: The object of Math Bingo is to get a pattern of five Bingo Bugs in a row by correctly answering math problems. Math problems are presented at the top of the game screen. Feedback is presented at the bottom of the game screen. Correct solutions to problems answered incorrectly will be displayed.

name: Cute Fighter
description: Released in 1998 by SemiCom, Cute Fighter is a sequel to SD Fighters, that aims to be even cuter!

name: Downpurr
description: A cutesy platformer-shooter about magic, cats, and rain.

name: Xbox 360 Triple Pack
description: The Xbox 360 Triple Pack is a game bundle that includes Trials HD, Limbo and 'Splosion Man

name: Do You Like Horny Bunnies? Complete Collection
description: The ZyX classic, Do You Like Horny Bunnies? is now remastered and improved, in one complete collection that includes both games in the series!

name: Touhou Gakuen Ki: Shippuu no Shou
description: Sin descripción

name: Swampstar
description: A one-act play in pixels that meditates on the broken swamplands of Louisiana's future.

name: Swampstar
description: A two minute vignette about being consumed by stars.

name: Forza Horizon 3: Platinum plus Expansions Bundle
description: In this bundle, Forza Horizon 3 with both Expansions and all Car Packs are included.

name: Duck Doom Deluxe
description:
“The classic NES gameplay of Duck Hunt,
The splendid brutality of Doom.
Together at last.”

Duck Doom Deluxe is the overhaul upgrade to the surprisingly popular mega-mix Duck Doom, originally released in November 2004.

Really, it's a stupid game; one that's sure to get old fast.

But if this is your first time playing, then more than likely, Duck Doom will be the most satisfying and unwittingly humorous retro gaming throwback you'll download this week.

name: DOOM Remake 4
description: DR4 is a compilation pack of various mods and assets which aims to bring Classic Doom into the modern era. It replaces all 2D sprites to the 3D models, adds new high resolution textures, shaders/materials and some other stuff.

name: Doom 4 For Doom
description:
D4D brings Doom 2016's weapons to GZDoom for all to enjoy, including a few customized versions of the multiplayer weapons. To this day, the mod is continuously being made more and more Doom '16-like, slowly but surely.

Guns. Demons. Violence. Runes. Glory. And it continues to grow to this day.

name: Doom Incarnate
description: The title says itself. Doom Incarnate is a Doom mod which is heavily based on new Wolfenstein series (TNO, TOB, TNC). It replaces our favourite hero Doomguy with two Nazi killing machines; BJ Blazkowicz and Rayne from BloodRayne.

name: Archipelago
description: A student project made by Team Patchwork, about sailing and exploring a group of islands.

name: The Trailblazer
description: You take the role of Malcolm Striker - a former member of Earth's special forces that main job was to obviously save the Earth on daily basis. A loner and a mercenary now, who's only purpose is to find and finish off his dreaded nemesis - Vladimir Vladimir, a one-man factory of lust for world domination. His shadowy presence is ever pervasive, and despite all of these ugly things getting in your way and giving you a reason to expend shotgun shells in some as ugly faces, such as invasion from outer dimension, caused by accident thanks to UAC, for which sure as 'Hell' V.V. is responsible for - perhaps one day you will finally face him upon the field of battle to avenge his lost love and the tragic refrigerator accident. Where that damned villain could be now, anyway?

name: HappyPlayers
description: A casual party game where you can freely match skills to fight.

name: Quake 2 TC
description:
“Quake 2 TC” Is a TC for Doom 2 that runs solely on GZDoom.

It uses all the original textures from Quake 2 on their original rendition as well as most of the ambient sounds of the game. The TC runs with the outstanding “Quake 2 Stuff” mod that brings all the weapons and enemies straight from the game into GZDoom with total accuracy.

The music comes from the Quake 2 port of Nintendo 64, composed by Aubrey Hodges.

My aim is to create a near perfect recreation of a ID Tech 2/Quake 2 level or expansion pack but with the Doom engine, enhanced and made possible only with GZDoom. Despite a few structural features and effects that are only possible on the Quake 2 engine, the results are near identical and that proves again how an ancient engine like Doom is capable to reach a similar level of technical capabilities with ease.

name: Doom Slayer Chronicles
description:
Doom Slayer Chronicles is the most beautiful and technologically advanced mappack for Doom2 singleplayer.
Doom Slayer Chronicles (DSC) compatible with all known gameplay mods for Doom2.
The DSC takes advantage of the newest features of gzdoom, such as hardware shaders, full-screen post-processing, PBR textures (normals and specular maps, also often called "bump mapping"), high-resolution textures, and of course dynamic lighting.

name: Yume no Tsuzuki.
description: Yume no Tsuzuki. is an interactive online Yume Nikki fangame. Contrary to most fangames, it doesn't contain effects. The main goal is to simply explore Piko's dream world.

name: Genseki Wakusei
description: Genseki Wakusei is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame. The goal is to explore Pershina's dream worlds and collect Stones (いし).

name: Kyou Kara Maou! Shin Makoku no Kyuujitsu
description: Kyou Kara Maou! Shin Makoku no Kyuujitsu is an Adventure game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2007.

name: The Other Line
description:
The Other Line is a game that started as a Yume Nikki fangame. It involves a boy named Nathan in his apartment haunted by nightmares who, by use of his phone, dials into the alternate world (the "other line").
Rather than totally free roaming exploration, there are more linear paths that focus on puzzles or events.

name: Ozmafia!!: Vivace
description: Port of Ozmafia for Playstation Vita and Nintendo Switch. It includes port-exclusive CGs and scenarios written by the original writer and illustrator, Yuumasu and Satoi.

name: Dreamscaper
description: Dreamscaper is an English Yume Nikki fangame. The game stars Natalie, a young girl who locked herself in her room. According to the developer, Dreamscaper uses American culture to contrast against the large amount of eastern/Japanese fangames out at the time. Dreamscaper plays like most fangames, focused on collecting effects and exploring Natalie's dream world.

name: DayDream
description: DayDream is a traditional Yume Nikki Fangame, with the main focus being on exploring the dream world and collecting effects. The game stars an emotionally unstable girl named Sadatsuki and has you explore her dreams.

name: Parade
description: Parade is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. At the beginning of the game the player is given the option to play as either Reika or Iwakutsuki. The goal of the game is to explore and collect effects. There are multiple endings for both characters.

name: Kage, Souzou, In
description: Kage, Souzou, In is a Yume Nikki fangame starring Kagerou. The game is related to Atteiu's other fangame Witoru. It plays like most Yume Nikki fangames, with the exception of effects (known as "items") having the ability to be used in real life.

name: Yoake
description: Yoake, originally called Yume 3kki, is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Otetsuki, a young girl. The overall mechanics of the game stay pretty traditional in terms of fangames. You can also play a minigame called "Dieing!!".

name: Starry Sky: in Spring Portable
description: Starry * Sky: In Spring - Portable is an otome game, developed by honeybee and was released in Japan in 2010.

name: Fushichou no Yume
description:
Fushichou no Yume is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Cap Boy, who seems to be part phoenix. The gameplay has dialogue, puzzles turn-based battles. It occasionally parodies Yume Nikki fangames.
This game also has achievements in the form of medals stored in a book that appears in the real room after you find at least one.

name: Ryokou-chuu
description:
Ryokou-chuu is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. It's a traditional fangame, but there are two unique elements to this game. First is that you can't wake up once you've entered the dream world. Secondly, a timer appears limiting your time in the dream world. You're given two minutes to explore and collect effects. The game ends when the timer reaches zero.

You play as a girl named Sazanami, who is staying in a hotel/dorm with what appear to be her two classmates.

name: Yamao-den
description: Yamao-den is a Yume Nikki fangame. Your main goal is to collect effects and explore Yamao's dream world.

name: League of Golf
description: A multiplayer team-based golf game with various skills and characters!

name: Bunnie Rabbot in Sonic the Hedgehog 2
description: Sin descripción

name: SUMBR: Super Ultra Mega Battle Royale
description:
A 2-8 Player Couch Co-op, Competitive Party Game filled with chaos. Mario Kart meets Super Smash Bros. meets Jetpack Joyride meets every other game in human existence.
Race and Fight through an intergalactic 2D Battle Royale. Escaping a giant Laser Beam of Death, evading a deadly Swarm of enemy aliens, all while shooting each other, and using your Power-Up collectables.

name: HypeSquad
description: HypeSquad is a fast-paced, close-quarters combat game anyone can enjoy. Be creative and personalize your combat style with unique weapon combinations and augmenters.

name: Unknown Pac-man gambling game
description: A bootleg version of Pac-man made by an unknow company released in an unknow year. The game run on the same hardware as 4 En Raya, a Connect Four-type game made by the Spanish company IDSA.

name: The Library of Babel
description: Join Ludovik in a 2D Stealth Platformer and Graphic Adventure, as he explores the jungles of a futuristic Babylon to discover the secret behind the Library of Babel’s sudden lockdown and the mysteries behind their mythical creators.

name: Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe
description: Welcome to Jacob Larkin's Wild Europe! Survive and Thrive as one of many lovingly recreated European species.

name: Maze Dungeon
description: Maze Dungeon is a 3D voxel rogue-lite game. Cleanse a maze-like castle full of monsters and defeat the castle's corrupt king to escape!

name: Forsaken Barn
description: Psychological horror game focused on finding items and solving puzzles while you are being haunted by a demon.

name: AV Racer
description: A 2D top down retro style arcade racing game, with career and two player split screen modes.

name: The Darkest Road
description: In this old-school RPG, you play as Callum and Lucia, the Trial Ones, as they find their way to be together in an epic battle that will change their and everyone else's lives.

name: The Last Man
description: A topdown survival space horror where a single enemy hit can end your life

name: Recon Control: Operation Crossfire
description: Prepare to lead your squad through another deadly operation, Crossfire.

name: Aspect
description: Venture into the caves, and explore the depths of the dungeon, to find the loot that hides inside. Will you make it through the gleaming crystal caves, and through the swarms of enemies inside? And when you defeat them, will you take the power of the enemies for your own?

name: Garbage Collect
description: A casual game in which you operate various machines to deliver garbage to the garbage station. Control various machinery through keyboard or mouse clicks to transport garbage to the garbage station. You can also challenge to collect stars and sea lions. A total of 20 well-designed levels.

name: Cosmic Purge
description: In this apocalyptic world a cosmic being has taken over Earth and spread its corruption all over. Join the bounty hunter Cassius on his mission to destroy the corruption from the mansion in this FPS game. Be warned, grotesque monsters are hell-bent on stopping Cassius from reaching his goal.

name: MewMew PewPew
description: Dinosaurs have invaded MewMew’s home and now it's time for him to pick up his trusty old meteor gun and send them right back to extinction. Keep your combo as high as possible and get stronger with items and powerups as you try to gain highscores in this chaotic 2D horde shooter.

name: Grederys
description: Grederys - is a short indie horror game with elements of stealth. The plot of the game revolves around the protagonist Kleit Kremer, who, returning home by taxi, gets into a terrible car accident. Test your strength in finding all the necessary items, keys and try to escape from the monsters.

name: Abort, Retry, Fail
description: Abort, Retry, Fail is a top-down roguelike action adventure in which you play as a lazy programmer that has to generate his own weapon and shoot his way through hordes of enemies. Are you brave enough to help him escape from computer hell of Windows 98?

name: YU-NO: A Girl Who Chants Love at the Bound of This World
description: Yu-No: A Girl Who Chants Love at the Bound of this World is a Japanese visual novel/ point-and-click adventure game developed originally as an adult game. The game's protagonist travels between various parallel worlds in order to solve the mystery of his parents' disappearance. Although parallel worlds are not an unfamiliar concept in science fiction, the game uses concepts from physics, mathematics, philosophy, history and religion to construct a unique fictional universe. In particular, the A.D.M.S. or Auto Diverge Mapping System; which visually displays the branching parallel worlds/storylines as a tree, aids the player in navigation.

name: Abysm 2: Pharaoh's Judgement
description: Abysm 2: Pharaoh's Judgement is an Expansion for the GZDoom mod Abysm 2: Infernal Contract. Includes a new singleplayer Campaign with new Weapons, Monsters and Quests.

name: Abysm 2: Spirit Falcon
description: Abysm 2: Spirit Falcon is an Expansion for the GZDoom mod Abysm 2: Infernal Contract. Includes a new singleplayer Campaign with new Weapons, Starting Equipment, Monsters and Quests as well as the Return of the Bounty system from Abysm 1.

name: ArmageDoom
description:
ArmageDoom is a partial TC for Zdoom, GZdoom, Skulltag, or Zandronum.
It features 7 new levels, 12 new weapons, many new enemies (with older ones revamped), new gore, and many new stuff.

name: HocusDOOM
description: Hocusdoom is a Total Conversion for Doom 2 that attempts to bring Hocus Pocus, a sidescrolling game by Apogee Software into the third dimension in a dazzling new adventure!

name: Midgard Outlaw
description: Midgard Outlaw is a total conversion for GZDoom/Doom II developed and released by Mike MacDee (Impie) in 2017. It is an 11-map sequel episode to Project Einherjar, released a year earlier: both projects are based on a dystopian novel series, Last of the Ghost Lions, set in the same universe. The gameplay involves lots of fast, brutal shootouts with enemies that die relatively easily, but can badly injure the careless player. Midgard Outlaw uses the same weapons and enemies from Project Einherjar, but adds several new foes, as well as a dynamic music gimmick: the soundtrack is comprised of ogg vorbis instead of midi, and switches from calm to intense at certain points during each mission. Unlike its sci-fi heavy predecessor, Midgard Outlaw has almost no sci-fi elements apart from the dystopian setting, focusing on an action movie motif instead. It also features a secret level, unlike the original.

name: Prodoomer
description: Prodoomer by PsychosilverTH is a 33 map total conversion of Doom 2 that is known for its RPG elements and legendary difficulty. It was designed for the GZDoom source port, as it takes advantage of many features made possible by GZDoom such as sloped 3D floors and dynamic lights.

name: Project Uber
description:
SHOOT STUFF, COLLECT SCORE.
Here's some features of the uber'd project!
Difficulty ahoy! This mod is pretty tough, especially on the last two difficulties. Try the first two difficulties first.
Difficulties change more than just health and damage of enemies. They will also add stuff like more projectiles, new attacks and special abilities, extra speed (mostly for melee enemies), and other things. There are quite some nasty new tricks awaiting in the harder difficulties, some downright mean. Can you handle it?

name: Damn Daniel: White Vans Adventure
description:
Damn Daniel: White Vans Adventure is an urban stylized rhythm game RPG, based on the titular character, Damn Daniel!

Daniel was invited to the Ellen show. While Daniel was asleep, his evil twin cousin Dark Daniel stole his white Vans! Now he must catch Dark Daniel before he gets on Ellen, and throws the whole world into Damnation with the power of the white Vans!

name: Horror Run
description: Horror Run is a Runner style arcade game where the user leaps and dashes through obstacles to get to the finish line. Play and survive through 12 levels as you complete your epic run as a Werewolf in the night.

name: Fowl Scourge
description: In this Dark Fantasy Action-RPG you are part of a plague doctor guild where every encounter with your patients is a boss fight.

name: Build Lands
description: In Build Lands you will have fun and relax building cute islands, freeing your imagination and building your own cute islands, being able to share in the workshop where the community can download them to have fun assembling them! Relaxing fun for all ages!

name: Daydream: When Butterflies Dance
description: The girl woke up in a dark wasteland and couldn't think of anything. It was a terrible world, full of dangers and full of wandering dark shadows. Be careful not to get caught by them.

name: Tiny Arcade Racers
description: Tiny Arcade Racers is a top-down 2.5D arcade racing game. Players may choose to compete against AI drivers in the World Tour or race for the best timing in the Time Trial. In the in-game garage, players can customize the colours of their vehicles.

name: MP5
description: MP5 is a dynamic TPP action shooter game with arcade elements.The game was built on the Unreal Engine, has a unique, disturbing atmosphere. Take the helm of a new highly advanced combat robot and get out of a mysterious military base!

name: Demise Sanctuary
description: Fight hordes of otherworldly monsters and explore procedurally generated dungeons in this addicting twin-stick action roguelike with beautiful pixelart. Mastering risk/reward mechanics and creating powerful Artefact synergies will be key to survive and escape the Demise Sanctuary!

name: Sunset Mall: Classic
description: It is here, the original Sunset Mall. From an older time. If you think about it, it is probably more nostalgic to play this version than the newer ones because this itself is now very old...

name: Ultimate Starfighter
description: An unknown Alien Race has launched a failed attack on Earth Station Alpha and are regrouping! Fight off the incoming fleets, discover where their ships are being constructed, and launch an assault! If Earth Station Alpha is destroyed, the planet will be lost and humanity exterminated.

name: It's Time
description: Play as a young scientist who invents a time portal and uses it to bring back his dead wife. Soon, things become chaotic in his life. Make choices and help people as you progress. Decide whom to save, your family or friends. Your choices determine the ending.

name: Abstract World
description: Abstract top-down game with shooter elements.

name: Colorful Party Wars
description: "Colorful Party Wars" is a real-time simulation game based on the cute group "Colorful Party" (a.k.a. "Karapari") that is active on the social VR platform VRChat! Lead your chosen club to victory in order to end the club war caused by an overabundance of club activities!

name: Interitus
description: Embark on a dangerous journey to a monastery where only death and decay remain. Explore the cursed hellscape and fight against challenging monsters in a realistic 3D-environment. Each play-session is unique from the previous one thanks to a randomized dungeon, with handcrafted rooms.

name: Astoria VR
description: AstoriaVR takes you back into the Astoria night club in 1986, one of the few legendary places in Leipzig in the former GDR. Audio recordings of former employees, interactive objects and private conversations create a fully immersive experience of times long past.

name: Hex Rally Racers
description: Race through spellbinding worlds on magic brooms and craft crazy hexes to leave your opponents in the dust in this action-packed, magical arcade racer!

name: Maid PizzaHub
description: In the PizzaHub you will try any pizza for every taste. Spicy, sweet or maybe both? Come to our pizzeria!

name: RitualSummon
description: The girl "Pella", who had been doing nothing in the original world, was summoned to the Midra continent as a saint. However, she has absolutely no interest in the high-risk, low-reward work of the Holy Maiden, and she just wants to find a way to go back.

name: Rabbids: Party of Legends
description: Embark on a legendary journey with the Rabbids in this hilarious party game! Join them on an incredible quest, filled with hilarious moments and colorful characters.

name: The Big Con: Grift of the Year Edition
description: Grift through the totally rad '90s in all its plaid and payphone glory!

name: Puzzle Collection
description: Amazing jigsaw puzzle collection with 40 beautiful puzzles in your hands or TV for everyone! Enjoy hours of gameplay with cosy pictures and relaxing music.

name: Paradise Island Driver
description: Explore a beautiful tropical island and pass a variety of exciting challenges and trials! Drive a dune buggy, food truck, circus truck and more!

name: Ancient Battle: Hannibal - Gold
description:
Ancient Battle: Hannibal Gold contains all the campaigns and downloadable content from the original game with no in-app purchases.
Experience the magnificence of the Punic Wars, as you follow Hannibal on his crucial campaign against Rome. Based upon, and a major upgrade to, the game system developed for Ancient Battle: Rome, a game that was the No.1 strategy game on the App Store in 8 different countries. Ancient Battle: Hannibal introduces many new game features including multi-level hills to elevate your strategic opportunities when commanding vast armies.
Fight the battles of the Second Punic War between Carthage and Rome. Each campaign is themed around battles between Hannibal's armies and their cunning opponents in the four geographical regions of Italy, Spain, Sicily and Africa. Hannibal's inspired tactics and leadership made him one of Rome's most dangerous enemies and possibly the greatest general of all time. Can you match his achievements on the battlefield?

name: RapidBrogue
description: Brogue is a classic Rogue-like game, enjoyed by thousands over the years and miles. This version is a compressed game, with faster advancement of skills and challenges so you can experience the full fun of this strategy game in a much shorter time frame than the full game. The full version is also available free on the iOS App store, so get them both!

name: Gothic Survival
description:
Gothic Survival is a game where you build up powerful abilities to mow down otherworldly monsters en masse - but beware the boss at the end of each chapter! Pixel art, magic spells, and intense gameplay, all wrapped up in the gothic ambience.
The monsters are ready. Are you?

name: Evolution: Indian Hunter - Unlimited Edition
description:
Evolution: Indian Hunter – Unlimited Edition
The complete version of our 3D adventure game as a gift for children!

name: K-ON!!: Houkago Rhythm Selection
description: K-ON!!: Houkago Rhythm Selection is a trading card arcade game released by Sega on November 13, 2014.

name: Virtual League Baseball 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Beverly Hills Models
description: From the publishers of hit interactive CD-Rom titles "Exposed" and "Tabloid Beauties", MacDaddy Entertainment proudly presents "Beverly Hills Models." Photographed in some of Beverly Hill's finest hotels, "Beverly Hills Models" offers 250 revealing photographs of MacDaddy's most beautiful girls. Browsing through the coveted MacDaddy Photo Album, search for the perfect pose of Cindy. Glance at the enchanting Ashley, Cuddle with the loveable Jessica. Peek at the sultry Lana. Or become intimate with the unforgettable Gina. The choice is up to you.

name: Tabloid Beauties
description: Sin descripción

name: Night Escaper
description: Survive until dawn !Night Escaper is a Rogue-like game which has 20 stages. Choose artifact, strengthen artifact, and acquire skills to destroy enemies. Survive at every stage with luck and skill.

name: Quickie World
description:
Quickie World is a ROM hack of Super Mario World created by Valdio. The hack features custom music and custom blocks, but contains no secret exits. Hence the name "Quickie" each level is short, but full of various Kaizo tricks.

A sequel titled Quickie World 2 was released on March 8, 2019.

name: World Heroes 2 Jet
description: Game Boy port of World Heroes 2 Jet.

name: Emergency Room: Code Blue
description: Sin descripción

name: Emergency Room: Heroic Measures
description: Sin descripción

name: What's Her face
description: Sin descripción

name: Ener-G: Modern Dance
description: Sin descripción

name: Epic Escapes Dark Seas, Mysteries of Ancient Inventors Atlantis, Elementary My Dear Majesty
description: Sin descripción

name: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial - Away from Home
description: Sin descripción

name: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial - Phone Home Adventure
description: Sin descripción

name: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial: Return to the Green Planet
description: E.T wants to visit his friend Eliot but doesn't have a spacecraft so he builds a spacecraft using what he knows best: botany. He secretly builds a craft using only organic resources found on the Green Planet and converts an oversize turnip into a spaceship that can carry him through space back to Earth. Along the way, E.T. encounters many strange and unusual alien life forms in E.T: RETURN TO GREEN PLANET.

name: E.T.: The Extra-Terrestrial - Search for Dragora
description: Sin descripción

name: Farm Frenzy: Animal Country
description: Have you ever wanted to be a farmer? In Farm Frenzy: Animal Country that's just what you become as you go down on the farm where the fun never stops. Here players take control of every aspect of running their own farm, including milking the cows, feeding the chickens, collecting eggs and finally, shipping your produced goods to market. The money you earn can be spent on expanding your production in a variety of ways like buying new livestock or maybe a new barn or other buildings like a bakery to add to your farming empire. But even in the most tranquil farm environments there are dangers to be wary of, around your farm that will be a group of nasty bears. They'll destroy everything if you let them. Be successful in all areas and your farm will prosper and you may even be rewarded with the 19 different achievement awards available

name: Farm Frenzy: Forever and Ever!
description: Sin descripción

name: Sveerz
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Collapse! Puzzle Gallery 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Collapse! Puzzle Gallery 3
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Collapse! Puzzle Gallery 4
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Collapse! Puzzle Gallery 5
description: Sin descripción

name: Smoking Simulator
description: Smoking Simulator tasks you with surviving a stressful day at work armed with only a handful of cigarettes.

name: Beneath the Cardboard
description: A survival game in which you play as a homeless child.

name: Cream and Cheese in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A ROM hack that swaps Sonic for Cream and Cheese (from Sonic Advance). Cream can fly like Tails, spindash and use Cheese to attack enemies remotely.

name: Brawlin' Sailor
description: Brawlin' Sailor is a short beat 'em up game which tells a humorous story about dreams and reality. The player controls a strapping sailor who receives a letter from a damsel in distress, locked in a lighthouse on a "seckrit island" by ferocious pirates. The goal is to make it to the lighthouse, beating up the enemies and bosses encountered on the way.

name: The Visit
description: The Visit is a short platform game. The player controls a mustached gentleman who wishes to visit his girlfriend.

name: A Second Chance
description: With great power comes great responsibility. Take control of all the crazy NASA Ground Control buttons on a mission to save the world.

name: Moon Waltz
description: One innocent dude goes out just to get some cigs. But as the clouds reveal the full moon, something way more than a joyful stroll begins!

name: Gnosis
description: Doug Bigham liven an enjoyable life as a member of a safety riot team, until he found himself lying in the middle of the debris of a town with no memory and serious injuries. His dream world and memories are his only method to rebuild the events that brought him to that situation. Collect the regular 19 effects and also Gag Effects to unlock the endings.

name: Sonic 3 & Amy Rose
description: A ROM hack of Sonic 3 & Knuckles which swaps Sonic for Amy Rose, with a different moveset.

name: Dream Genie
description:
Dream Genie is a Chinese Yume Nikki fangame Qiū Qín is the protagonist of this game. You collect Virtual Objects to gain progress, the game's version of effects.
A unique feature of this game is that Qiū Qín can be harmed by chasers in her dream, who will take off her Health Points if she is caught. Additionally, you can feed the strange pet rabbit Zabu with certain objects you can collect in the dream world to change its appearance, or release it and let it follow you through the dream world. You can also get four trophies by accessing some places in the game.

name: Sonic 3 & Sally Acorn
description: A ROM hack for Sonic 3 & Knuckles which swaps Sonic for Sally Acorn (from the Sonic the Hedgehog comics), with her own moveset.

name: Big the Cat in Sonic the Hedgehog
description: A ROM hack for Sonic the Hedgehog which swaps Sonic for Big the Cat (from Sonic Adventure), with his moveset based on a previous mod from the same author, Sonic the Hedgehog 2: Pink Edition.

name: RedCat: De Brutale Bankroof
description: Brutus and Max have robbed a bank. With the money they want to buy a lot of cheese and bones. On the way to the DogRock, an asteroid punches a hole in Brutus and Max's spaceship, scattering all the money through space. RedCat is going after the money.

name: Anarchy
description: Anarchy is a traditional Yume Nikki fangame with darker, more visceral imagery, along with a dark and heavy soundtrack. The protagonist, Anarchy, is unable or unwilling to leave his room. The game contains no effects. Many of the deeper-hidden maps in this game are labyrinths with a number of dead ends.

name: RedCat: De Toffe Tijdreis
description: RedCat eats a snack at the Burger Cat. While he is eating, Brutus and Max sabotage his UFO. When RedCat wants to leave again, his UFO runs amok and RedCat ends up in a cave. From WhizKitty (his girlfriend) he hears that he has ended up in prehistoric times and that the UFO needs energy, so that he can 'return' to the present.

name: RedCat: De Woeste Woordenbrij
description: Brutus stole the letters from RedCat during a spaceflight. In a chase by RedCat, Brutus crashes into a desert planet and RedCat scans the surface to find the letters again. Brutus, along with Max, works against him quite a bit in his attempts to collect the letters.

name: Starry Sky: in Spring 3D
description: Starry * Sky: In Spring 3D is an otome game, developed and published by honeybee, which was released in Japan in 2013.

name: At the Heart of the Forest
description: Ami is the stubborn little sister discontent with her weaknesses. She journeys into a forest of spirits where she seeks a fabled power. Explore a whimsical but mysterious land isolated from the world, where one’s resolve and heart is tested.

name: 13 Page
description: 13 Page is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The player starts as Akatsuki, a girl unable to leave her room. Her goal is to explore the dream world and collect all 13 effects. There is a notebook on the desk in Akatsuki's dream room the player can interact with that shows sketches of all the effects the player collects throughout the game.
