Hanatsuki, the other player character, is unlocked after completing certain tasks in Akatsuki's dreams.

name: International Soccer
description: Two 4-man teams. Each player controls one team member. Computer controls the other 3 men on each team, moving them to simulate two full 11-man teams. Two simulated 45-minute halves. Screen "scrolls" to follow the ball, so you can pass to an off-screen man. Player on defense can intercept passes or steal the ball. Scoreboard keeps track of goals scored, time left in each half and which half is being played.

name: Bahari
description:
You are a free diver whose passion for underwater photography will take you to discover the beautiful depths of the sea.

As a free diver you need to keep track of your oxygen level with the beats of your heart and make sure to refill your exhausted lungs from time to time. You’ll also be equipped with your trusty camera, with which you'll be able to photograph the terrain and fishes around you.

name: CandyRain
description: CandyRain is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars a girl named Minazuki and features simple dream worlds, some light-hearted and others utterly disturbing in tone and theme. Effects are called Candy in the game.

name: Aztlan Uncovered
description:
Explore an archeological site long lost to the ages. Use your time-reversing equipment to reveal the past and discover the secrets amidst the frozen wasteland.

Breaking news: a new archeological site has been found that will change the future of mankind. A temple frozen in its own time-bubble and long lost to the ages has been discovered amidst a frozen wasteland.

Use your equipment and your wit to reveal the past and enter the temple to find out what is causing this place to be finally revealed to the world for what was once lost in the snow, has come forth in the thaw.

Discover its secrets and unravel the mystery behind this beautiful landscape.

name: Mata, Itsuka.
description: Mata, Itsuka. is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The objective of this game is to explore and collect effects in Katsuki and Shun's dreams.

name: Asleep
description: Asleep is a traditional English Yume Nikki fangame. The player explores Ametsuki's dreams, which contain hints on the consequences of her horrendous actions in the past, and collect effects to unlock the multiple endings.

name: UnRequited
description: UnRequited is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Natsuki and the goal is to collect all the effects, which are called Scars in this game. There is also a music mini game called Limit reflection which can be accessed by interacting with the smartphone on the table.

name: Electron Handsome Boy
description: Electron Handsome Boy is a Japanese Yume Nikki Fangame. The goal is to travel through Luke's dream world to collect effects.

name: Ys III: Wanderers from Ys
description: A port for the PlayStation 2 was released by Taito in 2005

name: No Son of Mine
description: No Son of Mine is a survival horror game focused on combat, stealth, exploration, puzzle solving and uncovering a gruesome mystery. Your job is to find the truth, before he finds you. You will be hunted. You will be terrorized. Can you survive?

name: Nigella
description: Nigella is a Yume Nikki fangame starring Kuratsuki, a girl unable to leave her room. The game revolves around collection of effects scattered across a dream world entered through the protagonist's bed.

name: ShamaL
description: ShamaL is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as a girl named Modori who doesn't want to leave her room. The main task in the game is to collect all the effects.

name: Black Astral
description:
In a world ravaged by disease, join a feeble, old man in his attempt to escape the plague, traversing dimensions.

Black Astral is an English Yume Nikki fangame, made for Dream Diary Jam 2.

name: Double Dragon
description:
The NES version of Double Dragon takes a wide range of liberties with the interpretation. The entire graphical style is more in line with Technōs’ Kunio-kun series, with characters that go for exaggerated expression rather than gritty realism.

The biggest change, however, was reserved for the moveset. You start the game with only the punch, kick and headbutt available – all the other moves are obtained via an RPG-lite style experience system. Hitting enemies is now rewarded with a certain amount of experience points depending on the attack, and each time the counter goes above 999, you’re awarded an additional heart, which extends the range of possible actions. Two hearts add the uppercut and roundhouse kick combo finishers, and with three Billy can perform the jump kick maneuver. The fourth heart unlocks access to grappling moves.

name: Friday Night Funkin': Hotline 024
description: Meet Nikku, an alien girl that crashed on earth and was captured by a secret agency, she has been used for experimentation for years, until one day she was able to escape and decided to hide in an abandoned mall.

name: Double Dragon II: The Revenge
description:
Technōs created once again a vastly different experience with Double Dragon II on the NES. The experience system was dropped, but the moveset still underwent a few changes. The elbow attack and turning jump kick are gone, but with the standard kick directed backwards they seemed a bit redundant anyway. There are two new ways to make enemies in a grapple suffer, elbow smashes to the head, and a high kick to propel them away. In the brief time window when the Lee brothers are crouching after a jump or after getting knocked down, it’s possible to perform a rising uppercut or a knee jump attack. The timing for these isn’t easy, but they are the most powerful moves in the game.

On the NES, Double Dragon II is a much more innovative and unique sequel than in the arcade, but it marks also the time Double Dragon started its schizophrenic shifting between wildly different tones and gameplay styles. In a way it’s one of the best games to bear the Double Dragon name, but it’s hard to shake the feeling that Technōs had already started to loose a cohesive vision of what it meant to be Double Dragon, both in tone and in gameplay.

name: Double Dragon
description:
Double Dragon: The Revenge of Billy Lee is a beat 'em up game developed and published by Virgin Interactive in 1993 for Sega's Game Gear handheld console. It is a unique entry in the series, exclusive to the console, and implements many elements not seen in most other installments of the franchise.

The game was entirely developed by Virgin Interactive, with no involvement from Technōs other than its licensing; as such, it implements many aspects not seen in most other installments of the Double Dragon franchise, such as the ability to use firearms. Furthermore, in contrast to the gameplay style and aesthetics already established by previous games, the Game Gear version takes a unique approach that is more similar to other beat 'em ups, such as the Streets of Rage series.

name: Survive 10 Minutes Please
description: Survive 10 minutes please is a hardcore action roguelike 2D zombie game combined with RPG elements where you have to survive 10 minutes against different types of zombies using different tactics.

name: Amarantus
description: A visual novel about trainwrecks, trysts & treason. Roadtrip across the country to take down a tyrant. Befriend, torment, woo or wingman your party. Decide who you want to be. And maybe, just maybe: make it out of this one alive.

name: Balam and the Spirit Within
description:
Balam and the Spirit Within is an action-adventure, side-scrolling, Metroidvania game heavily inspired by Mayan culture and mythology. Adventure through dense jungles, sprawling temples, primordial caverns, and the otherworldly planes of the gods. Fight wild animals, carnivorous plants, towering golems, and hybrid monstrosities created by the gods of the underworld.

Stand against challenging bosses and learn the true meaning of sacrifice to restore balance to the world.

name: If Nil then
description:
if Nil then is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5.
You begin the game as a spirit named Nil, stuck in a blood covered room with a disembodied head. Interacting with the head will allow to take control of Nozomi.

name: I Had the Strangest Dream, Ivan
description:
I Had The Strangest Dream, Ivan is a Yume Nikki fangame made for Dream Diary Jam 2. The game is primarily in English mixed with Russian dialogue; the Russian text was produced with Google Translate and is not meant for the player to actually be able to read it.

You play as Alexei, an ordinary man who's been unable to find work. He stays in an unfinished building and has befriended a resident there named Ivan. Alexei is unable to leave due to the rainfall, so he stays inside and dreams.

name: Deathbed Lullabye
description:
Deathbed Lullabye is an English Yume Nikki fangame created for Dream Diary Jam 5. It differs from traditional fangames due to how the player only has 7 opportunities to enter the dream world before they are forced to trigger an ending. The dream world changes across 7 nights, with events, NPCs and locations becoming accessible and inaccessible depending on what night it is.

In the year 2004 within a hospital in Mexico City, you play as “Teicuh Maria Yayauhqui Calli,” age 37, a widow and musician. She's also terminally ill and is full of regrets about the questionable life she lived. She only has 7 days to live before she succumbs to her illness. If she either passes on peacefully or ends up in purgatory depends on the player's actions.

name: Somnium
description: Somnium is a Yume Nikki fangame. Unlike most fangame, in Somnium you can't choose the daydream you explore. The game has no effects, but instead you obtain memories.

name: Narcolepsy
description: Narcolepsy is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The game has two playable characters: Sakumozuki, who the player starts out as, and Hagitsuki. The goal of the game is to explore and collect effects.

name: Tokyo purgatorio
description: Tokyo purgatorio is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. The goal is to explore Ginji Suzumoto's dream and collect Lines (Effects).

name: Nihil
description: Nihil is a fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. Following a girl named Yorutsuki escaping from reality through her dreams, you are tasked with collecting several "Effects" found in her dream world.

name: RepresaL
description: RepresaL is a Yume Nikki fangame. You explore Nrutaz's dreams and, one unique feature in this game is an energy bar that the player must prevent from draining while awake.

name: Me llow
description: Me llow is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. Your goal is to explore Nuitsuki's dreams and collect all the effects.

name: Not Dream Syndrome
description: (not) Dream Syndrome is a Japanese Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Shiutsuki and explore her dreams.

name: Wait for Daylight
description: Wait for Daylight is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Nio, a girl who can't seem to fall asleep normally and spends her time daydreaming instead. The goal is to explore and obtain Wishes.

name: Braingirl
description: Braingirl is a Yume Nikki fangame. It stars Mikan, an apartment-dwelling lucid dreamer, and is primarily based around the collection of effects and exploration of the dream world. Scattered across its areas are a form of currency known as CD's, which can be used at vending machines and other types of vendors.

name: Frozen: Special Delivery
description: Requests for beautiful ice sculptures are coming from all around Arendelle. Help Anna, Elsa and Olaf deliver what's needed while practicing reading skills. Trace letters, spell words and more to unlock scenes from the Disney film!

name: MySims
description: The Nintendo DS version of MySims takes place in a vacation resort with the player tasked with the job of luring tourists. This is accomplished by doing tasks for the locals who live in your town and after you're done with a certain task you earn stars. Players collect stars to unlock other parts of the city as well as new minigames and new items in stores. As more stars are collected, the town grows and mini games are unlocked.

name: MySims Agents
description: In MySims Agents on the Nintendo DS, players are agents assigned by their agency to help the mayor stop a notorious thief from stealing an ancient treasure. By searching for clues, solving intricate puzzles, and matching wits with the thief, gamers can protect the treasure and the town! Along the way, they can talk to their favorite MySims, sharpen their agent skills with 10 different mini-games, and search through underground caverns for clues to the thief’s undoing!

name: MySims Kingdom
description: Your adventure involves you trying to get the island town back to its former glory as well as finding the villain responsible for the crime. You improve the town and get it back up by playing minigames such as Kayaking, Stargazing, and Balloon Present; and by placing decoratives around town and make the town look lively and beautiful again. Meanwhile, as you improve the town, clues are revealed and you unravel scenes in the story that will eventually lead you to the identity of the criminal.

name: Extreme Burger Defense
description: A tower defense game created in under ten hours. You're a scientist who has crafted the most delicious burger in the universe, which also happens to attract every bear in the universe. Including cyborg bears.

name: Manic Miners
description: Manic Miners is a fan-made remake of Lego Rock Raiders, a 1999 PC game, currently under development.

name: This is Just to Say
description: A poetic reenactment.

name: Tony Hawk's Underground 2
description: Tony Hawk's Underground 2 is based on the console game of the same name. Like the previous GBA releases of the series, it's an isometric representation of the console levels combined with polygonal characters. It contains both a story mode, in which you create a rookie skater and take him or her on a world tour with pros to improve their skills and win prizes; and a classic mode, in which you must accomplish various goals such as tricking off objects or getting a high score within two minutes. Changes in this iteration include removing the timer from most goals in story mode, allowing you to have several active at once and new moves like the nata spin, tantrum, which allows you to recover from a bail without losing everything, focus, where you can slow time in order to land the best trick and sticker-slapping.

name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
description: J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth is a land of beauty, magic, and darkness. In The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring, you follow Tolkien's narrative from the Shire to the halls of Moria, and finally to the banks of the River Anduin. Gameplay alternates between melee, archery, sorcery, and stealth as you control Frodo, Gandalf, and Aragorn. Join this band of heroes in their quest to destroy the One Ring, which contains all the power of the dark lord Sauron.

name: Test Drive Unlimited
description: Test Drive Unlimited is the ultimate automotive experience for car enthusiasts. Visit the most sophisticated car dealers to purchase new vehicles or simply take them for a spin. Collect and trade rare performance parts and customize each vehicle to make it one-of-a-kind. Test Drive Unlimited challenges players online to experience the most exotic and fastest vehicles on more than 1000 miles of diverse Hawaiian roads. Gamers win races, challenges, missions and tournaments to earn credits and purchase new cars, rare performance parts, homes and garages.

name: Surf's Up
description: When the Surf's Up, Cody Maverick comes running to hit the tubes with his board. Based on the 2007 film, Surf's Up follows the story of a young penguin surfer from Shiverpool Antarctica who enters the Big Z Memorial Surf Off on the island of Pen Gu. Single gamers may select from ten playable characters and then work their way through several environments including Shiverpool, Pen Gu, and the volcanic area. With friends, players may compete in a variety of competitions with such characters as Tank, Big Z, and Cody.

name: Sunshine Days
description:
You've been gifted the keys to a home of your own! Explore your new neighbourhood, with your friends and a cast of kooky characters full of heart!

Play with new friends and old, helping Mayor Sylvie and the other residents to make this mountain hamlet into a thriving and green community.

Your home is yours to personalise as you desire, but the village at large is one big community. Share and explore this new world together!

name: Night Loops
description: A journey through the psyche. Escape your night shift at the hotel, explore dreamlike worlds, and lose your sense of Self while reliving the time before dawn in this dark, adventure / puzzle game.

name: Petrified
description: Team up with your group of hunters to track down an invisible ghost and stop it from petrifying everyone or fall victim to the ghost's wrath.

name: The World of a Mermaid
description: Welcome in the underwater world of a mermaid, with aquatics creatures & the queen, welcome in The World of a Mermaid!

name: Button Lock 2: Star Carrier
description: Can you solve the puzzle with the limited amount of moves? Explore the world map. Solve the levels with different gimmicks. Get stars by beating levels to explore more of the world map. Solve over 170 levels in this puzzle adventure game.

name: 100% Orange Juice: Shifu & Reika Character Pack
description: This Extra Character Pack for 100% Orange Juice adds 2 new playable characters from developer Orange_Juice - Shifu and Reika from the SUGURI series, as well as character and announcer voices for them, and a bonus kitten pet!

name: The Splitting: Chapter 3
description:
The Splitting is a mystery adventure game.

In the 3rd chapter Daniel and geM visit Coldwin prison to look for llehctiM, who disappeared at the end of chapter 2 . There they learn more about Mitchell’s escape, and the mysterious ‘Dave’.

name: The Golden Time in High School
description: As a high school student of Shiguang high school, you will spend three years here. What kind of students that you will be? You can choose to study hard and get a good grade.You can choose to be an assistant to teacher to help with their daily affairs. Or just have a romantic date with somebody?

name: This is a Ghost
description: This Is a Ghost is a horror game in which you embody a ghost hunter. This action game will immerse you in the heart of a paranormal investigation, in solo or multiplayer.

name: Iku Iku Succubus
description: Succubi have arrived on Earth, and it's your job to teach them humanity's ways! Your job will be anything but easy as you unravel hidden ambitions, explore human culture, and serve as tour guide for Earth's tasty delicacies. Class is starting in the magical visual novel world of Iku Iku Succubus!

name: Dodo Life
description: Dodo Life is a game about a dodo that desperately tries to find the island where its species lives, avoiding as much as possible not being extinguished on the way by cruel predators in a Jurassic era.

name: Lamoneo
description: Lamoneo challenges your perception and logic. Every door reveals a dreamlike world in which fragments of different cultures and different times mix creating views of dream like beauty. This is non combat 3rd person adventure game.

name: Transport INC: Seamanship
description: Expand your Transport INC gameplay into the oceans of the world. New vehicles, events, custom routes, water themed maps, and more await beyond the water horizon.

name: Vowel Movements
description: In Vowel Movements you race against the clock to group words together into categories. The only catch is that each of the vowels has been replaced by a different vowel. Surely that can’t make things too difficult…

name: Soul Janitor
description: In Soul Janitor, play as the Janitor who returned from vacation to find all his coworkers murdered. A mysterious boss of your boss tasks you with cleaning up their souls. Armed with only a mop and a spray bottle, uncover the dirty secrets behind the murders of your coworkers!

name: Saturn Menace
description: It's 2320 AC your scientific exploration module has been damage by a meteor on the Saturn orbit near an old abandoned spacecraft. Must find new energy sources explore space and search a replacement for the core of your spaceship. Enjoy this singleplayer offline 80's 90's inspired sci fi movie game

name: Running on Magic
description: Woosh! Get ready to flee! Welcome to Running on Magic, a forced-scroll platformer where a quirky wizard is being chased by a tireless Grim Reaper. Hurry through procedurally-generated mindfully drawn environments as you defeat unalike enemies. Don’t let the Grim Reaper get to you!

name: Blue Oak Bridge
description: Blue Oak Bridge features breathtaking 2D hand-painted art in a storybook world of powerful witches, ancient magic and royal secrets. Farm, forage and fish throughout the island of Eloria and use all you discover to brew potions, make produce and help your new friends.

name: Rapture
description: Rapture is a casual game with roguelike elements, gain experience, collect items, level up and try to survive thousands of enemies as long as you can.

name: Doki Doki Family: Toku Itaishitsu no Doki-doki Kazoku Seikatsu
description: A sweet life with the "Doki Doki Family”! Leave everything to the heroines and enjoy a life filled with love and affection!

name: Cold Land
description: Help a bear find its lost cub in a beautiful lowpoly snow land. Activate runes along the way to be able to access new regions.

name: Forward Defense
description: Forward Defense is a top-down 3D singleplayer tower defense game. Join the United Coalition Force and defeat incoming waves of insurgent forces.

name: Zerocron
description: Zerocron is a straightforward, classical arcade Twin-Stick Shoot-Em-Up with a strong Commodore-Amiga-era feel. Blast asteroids and enemies to burning pixeldust!

name: GOT
description: Light and darkness have fought endless battles for dark resources! We must enter one side and fight it to the end!

name: Magic War
description: Game Features: - Beautiful Pixel Art - Dynamic Music - 30 levels - Hardcore

name: AlexanderBall: A Countryball Tale
description: Ascend to the Macedonian throne as Alexander the Great and relive his conquests! Fighting alongside redoubtable and quirky commanders, recruit numerous types of balls for your army, construct countless cities named Alexandria, and build an empire that stretches to the ends of the known world!

name: Fairy Biography
description: Spirits sealed in the Scrolls have escaped to the human world. As the heir to the Elder Scrolls, it is your mission to protect the world order and hunt down the Spirits that have escaped. Take your courage and step on your journey now!

name: Neighbor Fight
description: Multiplayer first person strategy game with lots of destruction. Destroy the house of your neighbor by throwing furniture and build a business by selling weed!

name: Drone Tinkerer
description: Drone Tinkerer is an open-world racing game with many RPG elements. In a sci-fi world full of secrets, defeat your racing opponents with speed or weapons, modify your unique drones with hundreds of upgrades, and experience mini-games and riddles to keep getting stronger to discover the truth.

name: Black Metal
description: Colonize. Explore. Survive.

name: Train Sim World 2: Spirit of Steam - Liverpool Lime Street: Crewe Route
description: Step back in time and discover the soot and sounds of the romantic steam era; climb aboard iconic living locomotives hungry for coal and water, and work hard on busy passenger and freight services through historic Merseyside and Cheshire with Train Sim World 2: Spirit of Steam!

name: The Pegasus Expedition
description: The Pegasus Expedition is a story-driven sci-fi grand strategy game set in a key moment for humankind’s survival. Facing an overwhelming threat at home, humanity sends expeditions to the Pegasus Galaxy in a desperate attempt to find a refuge for the population of Earth.

Psychedelic 3D maze-runner. Each level is more difficult than the last one. Fight an onslaught of enemies as you try to find your way to the center of the island. You play as a revenant, avenging your death, and trying to free your sister from prison.

name: Super Perils of Baking
description: Super Perils of Baking is a ground-up remake of Lillymo Games’ very first title, 2018’s 2D platformer Perils of Baking.

name: Mirador
description: MIRADOR is a 2D action game. You arrive at a temple... Kill several monsters to grow, get skills, and go through it!

name: Bomb It!
description: Bomb It! is a action packed multiplayer game. How it works? Drop bombs, destroy blocks, pick up power-ups, eliminate other players and earn trophies to win

name: Mortal Meal
description: Play as an untethered spirit, collecting fragments of your past while fleeing a cryptic force looking to consume your soul. Explore and survive an increasingly nightmarish world. Who are you? How will you avoid the harvest of your soul? What will you uncover with the time you have left?

name: Fragment time
description: Fragment time is a 2D dynamic puzzle game with different difficulties for players to choose. It can unconsciously improve hand speed and memory.

name: Poptropica
description: Join millions of players in the adventures of Poptropica! Establish yourself as the hero of your story while exploring mysterious lands and completing immersive quests. Uncover ancient mysteries, solve puzzles, and collect exclusive rewards throughout your travels.

name: Retrowave: Map Pack
description: Continue your exploration in the world of Retrowave with these unique new worlds!

name: Dream Walk: Mortgage
description: Dream Walk: Mortgage is a top-down arcade-style game that requires on quick maneuvering and simple multitasking. While avoiding bad-guys, petting cats, and collecting sunflower seeds, you must also remember to click the interest button. Accumulate Dream-Dollars to buy new shoes and dream-houses.

name: Scuffed
description: Scuffed is a single-player 2D movement shooter where the goal is to prove to your enemies just how much greater your capacity for violence is.

name: SCP: Archive
description: A cooperative multiplayer horror experience where it's up to you and your associates to make it out alive. Survival is not guaranteed, so keep everyone at an arms length and expect to have your trust broken as you're shoved into an endless black pit.

name: Arenas of Tanks
description: Fire up for fun with Arenas of Tanks, a tactical toy tank game! Use skill and strategy to defeat enemy tanks and upgrade your team

name: Royal Legends: Raised in Exile Collector's Edition
description: Save the king and his kingdom! Don't let a cunning and unprincipled villain ascend the throne! You are the only one who can influence the course of history. Are you ready to accept the challenge?

name: Hearts United
description: In the beginning, there was only once race, today known as the Ancestors. Now, there are more, and the conflicts are ever rising, on an eternal war for survival, after consequences of ill resolved problems, all races and people, for once, will have to learn to work together or be destroyed.

name: For Another Day
description: Start to play in the open world to master the game! For another day is a new world that need to be discovered from scratch by you.

name: Arclight Beat
description: Arclight Beat is a minimalistic rhythm based 3D platformer in which you control various level elements by modifying the music.

name: Hype Hustle
description: Hype Hustle is a speed running 3D platformer with twitch chat interactions built in. How quickly can you find and repair your spaceship before chat destroys you!

name: Village Guardians Break
description: 「Village Guardians」 is a VR action game in which you defend your base against enemies. Switch between guns, swords, hammers, and other weapons according to the situation and your preferences to defeat the attacking robots!

name: Yerr Out
description: A wacky & competitive baseball game! Choose from 30+ different animals to assemble your team, each with different attributes. Crush hits into the gap, throw nasty curveballs, make diving plays in the outfield, and bust out slides to breakup close plays.

name: MaDevil
description: MaDevil is a singleplayer adventure-rpg in which you are the last sane survivor of a devil-caused apocalypse.

name: Nemesis: Lockdown
description: Fully-fledged Video Game Adaptation based on one of the most successful BOARD GAMES in recent years. Play as one of the survived crew members. Plan and make actions in turn-based SOLO or MULTIPLAYER modes. Be a team player or a traitor - Each scenario will be DIFFERENT!

name: Hajis
description: You have to maintain your mentality in an place where any sound can cause your deathHajis is a survival co-op game 1-4 players.

name: Desert Blossom
description: -The game is a Japanese style roleplaying game with a substantial amount of yuri content, minimal amount of yaoi and Furry content. -This is a single plot. The favorability options of some characters affect the ending of the main thread. -Each character in the game has its own graphics, CG.

name: BoomCrash
description: BoomCrash is a small physics-based game aimed at destroying buildings and other architectural structures using explosives.

name: Frontier
description: The year is 1809, and you have set out to find your fortune on the new frontier! But beware: the legends of Native American lore are more than just campfire stories out here... Wendigos, Skinwalkers, Yetis and more are all too real in this newfound wilderness. Build, craft, and fight to survive!

name: Mysterious Things
description: Mystic Things is a 3D find and click puzzle game in which you have to find some items on the map within a certain time.

name: Hentai Packer
description: Hentai Packer is a unique but challenging puzzle game with high quality hentai girls. Pack them into tight spaces and unlock sexy scenes of your favorite girl!

name: Sciophobia: The Fear of Shadows
description: The year is 2014 and you are a reporter with The Maire Weekly News. In search of a new article, you have dug up all you can find, until you stumble across a promising headline from 1962. Will you find the truth about The Greer Property or will you die alone wandering in the forest?

name: Scaleplanet
description: Somewhere in the third dimension there lives an alien Joe. He can't sit still. He constantly travels and explores the world and galaxies. This time he came across a new planet.

name: 3 Club Golf
description: VR Golf with a robot. The perfect blend of actual golf skill and arcade challenge. Play alone or online at any of 12+ original and stylized golf courses. Customize everything! (including your robot caddie) Unlock challenges, find secrets, and collect prizes. It's like real golf, only more fun!

name: AWK: Adventures of Walker King
description: AWK follows the journey of a young DJ who returns home from boarding school to figure out his path in life. Join Walker as he navigates life in LA with his best friends, finds love, and discovers secrets - all while trying to balance his growth and newfound fame as DJ NO1.

name: Goblin Gladiators
description: Goblin Gladiators offers a deep dive into the wacky world of a battle arena as seen through the eyes of goblins. Goblin Gladiators is a brawl game starring goblins in a stadium with a euphoric crowd in the grandstands.

name: The Detective
description: Detective vintage game. Ask questions, search for clues, and items. Objects can tell stories too. In your notebook, you will mark who is lying and who is telling the truth.

name: AISZplus
description: You destroy the runaway electronic organ AISZ. Vertical scroll STG with all 5 levels.

name: Murders on the Yangtze River
description: "Murders on the Yangtze River" is a horizontal axis Chinese-style whodunnit detective game developed by OMEGames Studio. Players will find out the hidden truths of the final case through investigating and reasoning a pile of fantastic cases.

name: Pawsecuted
description: A tactical survival RPG. Play a rabbit escaping a koala-run convict camp in a procedurally generated, post-human Australian Outback. Battle hordes of emus and hire kangaroo mercenaries. Scavenge supplies, gather and trade materials, recruit followers and rebuild society.

name: Stay Alive
description: Stay Alive - survival in the open world. You are an operational journalist, your task is to go to Russia and take a couple of pictures about fires in the forest.

name: RMaze
description: Survive in a maze and eliminate your opponents with bombs, shurikens and melee weapons in this 2D fast action game.

name: Abedot Family Estate: Search For Hidden Objects
description: A game in the genre of "hidden object", in which you have to explore an old family mansion. Luxurious rooms, a library full of mysterious volumes, a winter garden and a creepy dungeon - explore locations, collect clues and beware of shadows in the corners!

name: Dungeon Team
description: Dungeon Team is a turn-based tactics team builder with 2 main game modes: PvP arena, and an idle dungeon crawl for leveling up your squads. 57 unique abilities from 8 mix-&-match ability trees (Bow Use, Alchemy, Conjuration, etc.), procedural equipment system, AI controls, and much much more!

name: Space Bees
description: RougeLite + Aircraft Shooter, a thrill-based game, kill the incoming enemies, upgrade your fighters and continue to face the tidal wave of enemies.

name: Beanstalk
description: Maybe there is a castle in the sky. Maybe there is a goose that lays golden eggs. And maybe your little broth won't get hurt if he falls down from the humongous beanstalk that's now growing in your garden. But you can't take any chances so you decide to climb.

name: Seasons
description: A precision platformer that each season introduces new mechanics and new challenges, in a beautiful and dangerous world, are you ready?

name: N31
description: The open-world map in N31 gives you the freedom to explore and hit new rivals every day. Jumps and shortcuts, buy new cars, beat all the rivals to reach the first position in the Wanted list. Fight against cops and rivals using your pure driving skill.

name: DuolBots
description: Grab a friend and build your very own battle bot. Add weapons to you bot and take your creation into battle against another team in online combat. Communicate with your partner to control your bot. You both control every part but each part has had their controls split between the both of you.

name: Witch Strandings
description: Witch Strandings dials into the emerging genre of physical transportation. A digital forest that extends beyond the boundaries of your screen, in an all-new Strand-type game.

name: Fly By Knight
description: Fly and fight your way through the magically altered tree you once called home! Free your friends from the prison gems that bind them! Find all your friends to open up an escape portal and get to safety!

name: One Many Nobody
description: The future of human kind is at stake. The planet's energy resources had run out and the urge to find an alternative source has become the only priority at any cost. Are you willing to accept your fate in this pixel art puzzle-adventure game set in a futuristic distopic world?

name: Sword and Shadow
description: This is a moba type game. In the game, players can choose one of five different characters and destroy the enemy crystals to win. The game provides a variety of weapons, players can buy equivalent weapons according to their money reserves, or sell weapons.

name: Save All Monsters!
description: Puzzle game where you place all the monsters in safe squares before the time ends! Analyze the chess-like attack patterns of weapons to avoid danger. Use resistant monsters to protect normal monsters from ranged attacks! Keep social distancing with bomb monsters! Discover and save all the monsters!

name: Let's Build a Zoo: Dinosaur Island
description: Escape to a brand new Dinosaur Island and discover a world of prehistoric beasts. Start a brand new zoo complete with terrifying (and adorable!) creatures, brand new themed shops and a whole host of new decorations to give your guests the ultimate dinosaur experience!

name: From Within
description: Delve into a fantastic old-school RPG featuring great characters and an exciting storyline, from the makers of Skyfall and Ashes of Immortality.

name: Ace Breakout
description: A top down shooter game fighting against large swarms of insects alone, or recruit friends to fight along side you! Buy and craft new equipment to help you rid the world of the swarm!

name: Seven Deadly Dates
description: You've studied latin for a few months and you accidentally read a passage from your textbook which lands you in a demon speed dating bar. Unsure of how to get home, you decide to ride it out and see how things go. Maybe you'll even find a date! Or maybe you'll find death? Who knows...

name: Soulbaby: Remastered
description: An original roguelite experience combining bullet-hell and traditional, turn-based RPG elements. As a newfound hero, endure countless waves of enemies as you shape your identity, increasing performance attributes and learning new skills, on a journey to uncover the mystery of a fading cosmos.

name: Idle Business Tycoon: Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 3
description: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 3. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!

name: Rhythm Quest
description: Rhythm Quest is a 2-button rhythm platformer game. Jump, attack, and fly to the beat through upbeat songs that are hand-crafted to highlight complex rhythms!

name: Summer Photo Album
description: "Summer Album" is a relaxing word game, accompany Xiao Xia to spend a fulfilling day in the morning, help her repair the album, and see what secrets will be discovered?

name: Jigsaw Puzzle Pack: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate - Variety Pack 20
description: Pixel Puzzles Ultimate, redefining digital puzzling.

name: If it's for My Client, I'd Even Schedule a Demon Lord
description: Pencil in time on your calendar for this parodical planner puzzle game more like work than any other! This witty career will have you solving schedules for everyone from your brother to a demon lord.

name: The Twilight of Infinity
description: Anyone with a time machine can change history, but saving it requires creative problem solving. Pocket sized episodes based on the greatest unsolved mysteries; solve, manipulate, interrogate and impersonate. The only thing you don't have to worry about with time travel is being late.

name: Cyberpoly
description: Cyberpoly is an open-world, third person shooter, and RPG set in the Dark City — a dangerous city dominated by money, crimes, and illegal trades. You play as a mercenary who takes missions, works in secondary jobs, builds prestige, and unlock upgrades.

name: Idle Business Tycoon: Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 1
description: Expand and grow! The possibilities are plenty in Idle Business Tycoon - Build Simulator - Expansion Pack 1. Earn money to unlock new establishments and expand your business all over town. The more you build, the more money you make!

name: Grimhunt
description: Paranormal investigation game.The Grimoire hides many secrets and information precious to arcane investigators.Search for magical creatures, rare animals and the hidden world in this simulation game.

name: Principle of Karma
description: Principle of Karma - Birth-Life-Death-Repeat

name: Space Turbo 2
description: Space Turbo 2 - Continuation of a dynamic arcade game in which you have to fly a futuristic space plane through an endless tunnel and avoid various traps.

name: The Devil's Chosen
description: Demons fled from hell and civilization fell. Now it's up to you to gather survivors, scavenge for resources and build a community in a post-apocalyptic world on cards - a world where you define what it means to survive.

name: Blickel
description: A colorful and retro 2D platformer where you must shoot enemies, platform around tough obstacles, and race through several distinct worlds each with its own unique challenges and gameplay elements. Can you make it to the end?

name: A War of a Madman's Making
description: You are subordinate to a deranged dictator and must plan his doomed invasion in this text-based RPG / Visual Novel. Navigate the shark-filled waters of the Great Leader's presidential cabinet, and try to save your family and survive the purges in a world of power-hungry leaders and nuclear warfare.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Trains 2
description: Puzzles of Trains!

name: Schizoids
description: In this classic top-down space game from 1983, you can take on one of the most dangerous jobs in the galaxy: garbage disposal. Try to survive for as long as possible, while knocking the giant garbage pods into a black hole with your Space-Dozer.

name: Paranormal Organization: Magic Academy
description: This is an EDU game, you can call excellent witch as your students, give them single course, multi-course, improve their magic level, you can go to alchemy workshop to refine magic tools, when the witch strength is enough, challenge higher magic level, sorcerer, magic king, supreme god.

name: Thread
description: A puppet themed platformer metroidvania with a focus on platforming rather than combat. Throw your crystal scissors into walls to create your own platforms, explore a twisting and mysterious land, and solve puzzles on a worldwide scale.

name: Maggie the Magnet
description: Science doesn't have to be boring! Use the powers of gravity and magnetic attraction to fling yourself across the laboratory and help Maggie solve dozens of puzzles to fulfill her mission as a researcher!

name: Popplings
description: Strategise your line clears to beat your opponents, both locally and online! Popplings takes you back to the nineties with its nostalgic feel in both style and gameplay, taking competitive puzzles to the next level!

name: BlastMania
description: Destroy as many robots as possible and survive until the end ! Improve your shoot, unlock abilities, upgrade your weapons and earn as many points as you can. Make the best decisions to optimize your run and reach the top of the leaderboard !

name: Paranecro
description: Our character is a detective with a busy business life. But it has a bad history. He lost his wife and 1-month-old child in his womb in a traffic accident. That's why he's a bit of a psychiatrist. After losing his wife, he experienced strange events.

name: Egression
description: You’re here for puzzles, and that’s what you’ll get. Step into a deluxe virtual escape room establishment. Challenge your mind with handcrafted puzzles designed exclusively for VR. Explore immersive environments and piece together the clues to escape!

name: Pandaman
description: Action design The monster moves widely, sometimes blinking, sometimes surprising, sometimes funny and ironic, With complete sound effects and special effects, players can experience unparalleled tension and excitement.

name: Mon-Musu Master
description: You can make all Mon-Musu join your team! Create your original party and save the world! A retro black-and-white RPG. Featuring countless Mon-Musu! Fight them, add them to your team, and beat the Dark Lord!

name: The Touhou Empires
description:
The Touhou Empires is a real-time strategy simulation game (RTS) in which you lead Touhou Project characters and fairies with various abilities to fight!

Players command Touhou Project's catactors and fairies to complete the prepared missions while responding to ever-changing situations!

The game flow is as follows: players collect resources from the map, construct buildings to expand their own camps, and organize their armies to advance and march.
Then, organize your army, march forward, and battle the enemy to complete the mission!

name: Murdo's Quest
description: Rescue your family and defeat Count Othar in this old-school platformer. Inspired by the "Addams Family" game for the NES. This game presents a unique and challenging platforming experience.

name: Cropped
description: Cropped is a first-person action horror adventure - Survive the night as the farm you've arrived at has taken a turn for the worse...

name: The Creature Zone VR
description: welcome to the experiment, The Creature Zone VR is thrilling, scary, and fun. get ready for spooky time. choose between the three levels present, vent run, terry's pizzeria, and missing friend. they are all spooky games.

name: Beauty Paradise
description: Choose your own story as you take over a beach resort, of course it's not all fun and games but at least the park is filled with an array of beautiful women to distract you. Your choices will determine the story and whether romance is in the air and how your beach visit will end.

name: Phromg Game
description: Jumping Simulator, Swimming Simulator, Ribbit.

name: Royal Jigsaw 2
description: New Royal Jigsaw, 700 unique puzzles - that's the choice of real kings! Collect all the photos and you'll see the greatest landscapes, famous castles and palaces of the world!

name: Solitaire Game Christmas
description: Christmas is a time for fun winter games: throwing snowballs, secret Santa and… Solitaire! There are 12 reasons to play it!

name: Dark Desire 2
description: This visual novel continues the life of the girls in the Cindy universe, even at different ages. This way you can explore all kind of kinks and pleasures and topics.

name: Speed is Key
description: Speed is Key is a tough, fast-paced precision platformer where, well... speed is key.

name: The Backroom Project
description: Scientists made a new discovery about the Backrooms. Noclipping out of bounds in normal reality was a myth for long, but now it can be reality! Now they are looking for subjects to test it on civil people. There are already scientists inside, so you have nothing to worry about, they say. Or do you?

name: Miss Cecilia
description: Miss Cecilia would always be in a position, always thinking of someone who could take her away, but how could anyone ever show up?

name: Tower of Wishes 2: Vikings Collector's Edition
description: Climb the tower and save your Vikings! Tower Of Wishes 2: Vikings is a family friendly Match 3 with modern design and aesthetics. The game also includes extras such as Pipe Join, Memory, Chain Solitaire and Sliders for that bit of extra fun!

name: Ygeia
description: Ygeia is an introspective puzzle-solving adventure game in which the player must overcome a series of challenges that could lead to anxiety.

name: That Which Was Lost
description: Delve into a fantastic old-school RPG featuring great characters and an emotional storyline developed by the makers of Ultima Adventum.

name: The Old War
description: This is an indie-developed co-op strategy game set in a dark medieval fantasy world.

name: Galactic Liberation
description: "Galactic Liberation" is a classic 2D arcade scrolling shooter, with a side view. Nice graphics and atmospheric music will immerse you in a space battle.

name: Square Keeper
description: Square Keeper is a puzzle game, based on a card system, where each card gives the player the possibility to execute different actions, like a sword swing, shooting with a bow or simply walking.

name: UnderWay
description: UnderWay is a graffiti game based on simulation. Alone or with your friends, paint where you want, buy your sprays (or steal them) in the different stores of the city! and try to dodge the security to paint the walls and subways of the capital.

name: The Knight Witch
description: The Knight Witch is a metroidvania adventure game with fast-paced, shoot 'em up combat set in a beautifully hand-drawn world. Cast devastating card-based spells, forge close bonds, and make moral choices all in your quest to save your home and discover who's behind the War Golem invasion.

name: YonDelver
description: YonDelver is a roguelike bullet-hell hack n' slash. With no stone left unturned on the surface, corporations fight over the rights to massive sinkholes known as "Delves". Team up with players and build up an arsenal before taking on the terrors that sleep deep under the clouds within the delve.

name: The Forgotten Boundary
description: "The Forgotten Boundary" is a stand-alone independent game based on magic tower strategy puzzle solving, map exploration, and dungeon challenge.

name: Falling Elevator
description: Welcome in Falling Elevator which is a casual unique game. Have you ever been stuck in an elevator? Well, if no, be ready for what's worse. Besides the fact you're stuck there with a few people, THE ESCALATOR IS FALLING !!!

name: Rota
description: Rota is a gravity bending puzzle platforming adventure! Walk over the edge to rotate your gravity. Push, pull and rotate gravity-blocks to traverse the stage and solve puzzles. Collect all 50 gems and explore 8 vibrant worlds!

name: Macabre
description: A multiplayer horror game where you work with (or against) other players to solve randomised puzzles in procedural maps. As you search for clues, you'll need to watch your back as there are cunning creatures from beyond this world watching your every move, waiting for the opportune moment to strike!

name: The Elf Maiden
description: You are the Fair Maiden. Walk upon the lands to gather the souls of fallen warriors from past events and escort them to the Holy Land. Fight to gain power and free the fallen who deserve rest and peace.

name: Eternal Samurai
description: Possess your enemies and take revenge against the evil lords of the land in this retro-platformer action game

name: Goog
description: Goog is a top down survival game with bullet elements. Explore GOOG and discover the secrets of this strange world. Defeat the idols of this world on a path to discover who you are and why you're here.

name: Rukimin's Disappointing Adventure!
description: Action game suitable for live game play and streaming, which looks cute but full of unreasonable traps! "RUKIMIN's Disappointing Adventure!" series is a 2D side-scrolling action game in which you control Shobomi, a cute cat character, and aim for the goal!

name: Festival
description: Festival is a role playing game that tells a story about the foolish games and roles we play. Set in a renaissance festival & surrounding modern city; Explore a fully-voiced uniquely-written open world, solve mysteries, battle creepies and loot your perfect new gear. Do you believe in magic?

name: Case #1472
description: A mysterious woman is sitting in front of you. Who is she? And who are you? And why are you both there? Case #1472 is mystery thriller information digging interrogation game where there are more things going on than what meets the eye, but are you able to unravel what has happened?

name: Nano Organism
description: Nano Organism - is a real-time strategy game, you control nano cells to control the entire organism, lots of puzzles, dynamic progression, lots of research, achievements, free choice of development direction and progression.

name: SokoChess
description: SokoChess is a minimalistic puzzle game about pushing chess pieces. Use your pieces to push the black figures to their destination, but be careful! The opposing pieces will capture yours if you give them the chance!

name: Ody Mos
description: A lewd physic-based 3D puzzle game.

name: Boo Men
description: Boo Men is a 1-4 player online co-op horror game. You and your crew of burglars are tasked with stealing the items on a list. Just remember to stay in the light because you never know what is lurking in the dark...

name: Amanda's Magic Book 4: True Love
description: In this magical Match-3 game, Amanda joins forces with Charlie in order to escape from a cursted castle and a fallen in love beast to save her father and the fairy tale world.

name: Whisper Books
description: Whisper Books is a visual novel game of plot quality signature, embellished with illustrations, dubbing and interactive options. Whisper Books resembles a mini library of stories. Players can vote for new story auditions and winners will be developed into expansion packs.
